This is the message to be conveyed: Shall any perish but the ungodly?
verse_ar: فَٱصْبِرْ كَمَا صَبَرَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْعَزْمِ مِنَ ٱلرُّسُلِ وَلَا تَسْتَعْجِل لَّهُمْ ۚ كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَ مَا يُوعَدُونَ لَمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا سَاعَةًۭ مِّن نَّهَارٍۭ ۚ بَلَٰغٌۭ ۚ فَهَلْ يُهْلَكُ إِلَّا ٱلْقَوْمُ ٱلْفَٰسِقُونَ

verse_en: THOSE WHO DISBELIEVE and obstruct (others) from the way of God will have wasted their deeds.
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ

verse_en: But those who believe and do the right, and believe what has been revealed to Muhammad, which is the truth from their Lord, will have their faults condoned by Him and their state improved.
verse_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَءَامَنُوا۟ بِمَا نُزِّلَ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍۢ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّهِمْ ۙ كَفَّرَ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ وَأَصْلَحَ بَالَهُمْ

verse_en: That is because those who refuse to believe only follow what is false; but those who believe follow the truth from their Lord. That is how God gives men precepts of wisdom.
verse_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلْبَٰطِلَ وَأَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلْحَقَّ مِن رَّبِّهِمْ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَضْرِبُ ٱللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ أَمْثَٰلَهُمْ

verse_en: So, when you clash with the unbelievers, smite their necks until you overpower them, then hold them in bondage. Then either free them graciously or after taking a ransom, until war shall have come to end. If God had pleased He could have punished them (Himself), but He wills to test some of you through some others. He will not allow the deeds of those who are killed in the cause of God to go waste.
verse_ar: فَإِذَا لَقِيتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَضَرْبَ ٱلرِّقَابِ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَثْخَنتُمُوهُمْ فَشُدُّوا۟ ٱلْوَثَاقَ فَإِمَّا مَنًّۢا بَعْدُ وَإِمَّا فِدَآءً حَتَّىٰ تَضَعَ ٱلْحَرْبُ أَوْزَارَهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَوْ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ لَٱنتَصَرَ مِنْهُمْ وَلَٰكِن لِّيَبْلُوَا۟ بَعْضَكُم بِبَعْضٍۢ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ قُتِلُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَلَن يُضِلَّ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ

verse_en: He will show them the way, and better their state,
verse_ar: سَيَهْدِيهِمْ وَيُصْلِحُ بَالَهُمْ

verse_en: And will admit them into gardens with which he has acquainted them.
verse_ar: وَيُدْخِلُهُمُ ٱلْجَنَّةَ عَرَّفَهَا لَهُمْ

verse_en: O you who believe, if you help (in the cause of) God He will surely come to your aid, and firmly plant your feet.
verse_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِن تَنصُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ يَنصُرْكُمْ وَيُثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَكُمْ

verse_en: As for the unbelievers, they will suffer misfortunes, and their deeds will be rendered ineffective.
verse_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَتَعْسًۭا لَّهُمْ وَأَضَلَّ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ

verse_en: That is so as they were averse to what has been revealed by God, and their actions will be nullified.
verse_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَرِهُوا۟ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأَحْبَطَ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ

verse_en: Have they not journeyed in the land and seen the fate of those before them? Destroyed they were utterly by God; and a similar (fate) awaits the unbelievers.
verse_ar: ۞ أَفَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ دَمَّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ وَلِلْكَٰفِرِينَ أَمْثَٰلُهَا

verse_en: This is so for God is the friend of those who believe while the unbelievers have no friend.
verse_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوْلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَأَنَّ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ لَا مَوْلَىٰ لَهُمْ

verse_en: Verily God will admit those who believe and do the right into gardens with streams of water running by. But the unbelievers revel and carouse and subsist like beasts, and Hell will be their residence.
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدْخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ جَنَّٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يَتَمَتَّعُونَ وَيَأْكُلُونَ كَمَا تَأْكُلُ ٱلْأَنْعَٰمُ وَٱلنَّارُ مَثْوًۭى لَّهُمْ

verse_en: How many were the habitations, mightier than your city which has turned you out, which We destroyed; and they did not have a helper.
verse_ar: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرْيَةٍ هِىَ أَشَدُّ قُوَّةًۭ مِّن قَرْيَتِكَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَخْرَجَتْكَ أَهْلَكْنَٰهُمْ فَلَا نَاصِرَ لَهُمْ

verse_en: Can one who stands on a clear proof from his Lord, be like one enamoured of his evil deeds and follows his inane desires?
verse_ar: أَفَمَن كَانَ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ كَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُۥ سُوٓءُ عَمَلِهِۦ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُم

verse_en: The semblance of Paradise promised the pious and devout (is that of a garden) with streams of water that will not go rank, and rivers of milk whose taste will not undergo a change, and rivers of wine delectable to drinkers, and streams of purified honey, and fruits of every kind in them, and forgiveness of their Lord. Are these like those who will live for ever in the Fire and be given boiling water to drink which will cut their intestines to shreds?
verse_ar: مَّثَلُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلَّتِى وُعِدَ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ ۖ فِيهَآ أَنْهَٰرٌۭ مِّن مَّآءٍ غَيْرِ ءَاسِنٍۢ وَأَنْهَٰرٌۭ مِّن لَّبَنٍۢ لَّمْ يَتَغَيَّرْ طَعْمُهُۥ وَأَنْهَٰرٌۭ مِّنْ خَمْرٍۢ لَّذَّةٍۢ لِّلشَّٰرِبِينَ وَأَنْهَٰرٌۭ مِّنْ عَسَلٍۢ مُّصَفًّۭى ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ وَمَغْفِرَةٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ كَمَنْ هُوَ خَٰلِدٌۭ فِى ٱلنَّارِ وَسُقُوا۟ مَآءً حَمِيمًۭا فَقَطَّعَ أَمْعَآءَهُمْ

verse_en: There are some who listen to you; but as soon as they go from you they say to those who were given knowledge: "What is this he is saying now?" They are those whose hearts have been sealed by God, and they follow their own lusts.
verse_ar: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَسْتَمِعُ إِلَيْكَ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا خَرَجُوا۟ مِنْ عِندِكَ قَالُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْعِلْمَ مَاذَا قَالَ ءَانِفًا ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ

verse_en: But those who are rightly guided will be given greater guidance by Him, and they will have their intrinsic piety.
verse_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهْتَدَوْا۟ زَادَهُمْ هُدًۭى وَءَاتَىٰهُمْ تَقْوَىٰهُمْ

verse_en: Do they wait for any thing but the Hour (of change), that it may come upon them suddenly? Its signs have already appeared. How then will they be warned when it has come upon them?
verse_ar: فَهَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ أَن تَأْتِيَهُم بَغْتَةًۭ ۖ فَقَدْ جَآءَ أَشْرَاطُهَا ۚ فَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمْ إِذَا جَآءَتْهُمْ ذِكْرَىٰهُمْ

verse_en: Know then, therefore, there is no god but He, and ask forgiveness for your sins and those of believing men and women. God knows your wanderings and your destination.
verse_ar: فَٱعْلَمْ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْ لِذَنۢبِكَ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مُتَقَلَّبَكُمْ وَمَثْوَىٰكُمْ

verse_en: Those who believe say: "How is it no Surah was revealed?" But when a categorical Surah is revealed that mentions war, you should see those who are sceptical staring at you like a man in the swoon of death. Alas the woe for them!
verse_ar: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَوْلَا نُزِّلَتْ سُورَةٌۭ ۖ فَإِذَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌۭ مُّحْكَمَةٌۭ وَذُكِرَ فِيهَا ٱلْقِتَالُ ۙ رَأَيْتَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيْكَ نَظَرَ ٱلْمَغْشِىِّ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلْمَوْتِ ۖ فَأَوْلَىٰ لَهُمْ

verse_en: Obedience and modest speech (would have been more becoming). And when the matter has been determined it is best for them to be true to God.
verse_ar: طَاعَةٌۭ وَقَوْلٌۭ مَّعْرُوفٌۭ ۚ فَإِذَا عَزَمَ ٱلْأَمْرُ فَلَوْ صَدَقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيْرًۭا لَّهُمْ

verse_en: Is it possible that if placed in authority you will create disorder in the land and sever your bonds of relationship?
verse_ar: فَهَلْ عَسَيْتُمْ إِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ أَن تُفْسِدُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَتُقَطِّعُوٓا۟ أَرْحَامَكُمْ

verse_en: They are those who were condemned by God, whose ears were blocked by Him and their eyes blinded.
verse_ar: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُمْ وَأَعْمَىٰٓ أَبْصَٰرَهُمْ

verse_en: Do they not ponder on what the Qur'an says? Or have their hearts been sealed with locks?
verse_ar: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ أَمْ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبٍ أَقْفَالُهَآ

verse_en: Those who turn their backs after the way of guidance has been opened to them, have been surely tempted by Satan and beguiled by illusory hopes.
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱرْتَدُّوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَدْبَٰرِهِم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلْهُدَى ۙ ٱلشَّيْطَٰنُ سَوَّلَ لَهُمْ وَأَمْلَىٰ لَهُمْ

verse_en: This was so because they said to those who disdain what God has revealed: "We shall obey you in some things." But God knows their secret intentions well.
verse_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَالُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُوا۟ مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ سَنُطِيعُكُمْ فِى بَعْضِ ٱلْأَمْرِ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ إِسْرَارَهُمْ

verse_en: How will it be when the angels draw out their souls striking their faces and their backs?
verse_ar: فَكَيْفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتْهُمُ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ يَضْرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمْ وَأَدْبَٰرَهُمْ

verse_en: Because they followed what displeases God, and they were averse to pleasing Him. So We nullified their deeds.
verse_ar: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ ٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَآ أَسْخَطَ ٱللَّهَ وَكَرِهُوا۟ رِضْوَٰنَهُۥ فَأَحْبَطَ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ

verse_en: Do they whose minds are filled with doubt, think that God will not expose their malice?
verse_ar: أَمْ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَن لَّن يُخْرِجَ ٱللَّهُ أَضْغَٰنَهُمْ

verse_en: Had We pleased We could have shown them to you that you could know them by their marks, and recognise them from the way they twist their words. Yet God knows all your deeds.
verse_ar: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَأَرَيْنَٰكَهُمْ فَلَعَرَفْتَهُم بِسِيمَٰهُمْ ۚ وَلَتَعْرِفَنَّهُمْ فِى لَحْنِ ٱلْقَوْلِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ أَعْمَٰلَكُمْ

verse_en: We shall try you in order to know who are the fighters among you, and who are men of fortitude, and verify your histories.
verse_ar: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُمْ حَتَّىٰ نَعْلَمَ ٱلْمُجَٰهِدِينَ مِنكُمْ وَٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ وَنَبْلُوَا۟ أَخْبَارَكُمْ

verse_en: Surely those who do not believe, and obstruct others from the path of God, and oppose the Prophet after the way of guidance has been opened to them, will not hurt God in the least, and He will nullify all that they have done.
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَشَآقُّوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلْهُدَىٰ لَن يَضُرُّوا۟ ٱللَّهَ شَيْـًۭٔا وَسَيُحْبِطُ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ

verse_en: O you who believe, obey God and the Prophet, and do not waste your deeds.
verse_ar: ۞ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبْطِلُوٓا۟ أَعْمَٰلَكُمْ

verse_en: Those who do not believe and obstruct others from the way of God, and die disbelieving, will not be pardoned by God.
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ مَاتُوا۟ وَهُمْ كُفَّارٌۭ فَلَن يَغْفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ

verse_en: So do not become weak-kneed and sue for peace, for you will have the upper hand as God is with you and will not overlook your deeds.
verse_ar: فَلَا تَهِنُوا۟ وَتَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّلْمِ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَوْنَ وَٱللَّهُ مَعَكُمْ وَلَن يَتِرَكُمْ أَعْمَٰلَكُمْ

verse_en: Verily the life of this world is no more than a sport and frivolity. If you believe and fear God, he will give you your reward, and will not ask for your possessions.
verse_ar: إِنَّمَا ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا لَعِبٌۭ وَلَهْوٌۭ ۚ وَإِن تُؤْمِنُوا۟ وَتَتَّقُوا۟ يُؤْتِكُمْ أُجُورَكُمْ وَلَا يَسْـَٔلْكُمْ أَمْوَٰلَكُمْ

verse_en: If He asks for all you possess and insist upon it, you will become niggardly, and it will bring out your malevolence.
verse_ar: إِن يَسْـَٔلْكُمُوهَا فَيُحْفِكُمْ تَبْخَلُوا۟ وَيُخْرِجْ أَضْغَٰنَكُمْ

verse_en: Beware! You are called to spend in the way of God, yet some among you close their fists. But he who is niggardly is so for his own self: God is above need, and it is you who are needy. If you turn away then God will bring other people in your place who, moreover, will not be like you.
verse_ar: هَٰٓأَنتُمْ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ تُدْعَوْنَ لِتُنفِقُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَمِنكُم مَّن يَبْخَلُ ۖ وَمَن يَبْخَلْ فَإِنَّمَا يَبْخَلُ عَن نَّفْسِهِۦ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ ٱلْغَنِىُّ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلْفُقَرَآءُ ۚ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوْا۟ يَسْتَبْدِلْ قَوْمًا غَيْرَكُمْ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُونُوٓا۟ أَمْثَٰلَكُم

verse_en: WE HAVE GIVEN you a splendent victory
verse_ar: إِنَّا فَتَحْنَا لَكَ فَتْحًۭا مُّبِينًۭا

verse_en: That God may save you from earlier and subsequent blames, and complete His favours on you, and guide you on the straight path,
verse_ar: لِّيَغْفِرَ لَكَ ٱللَّهُ مَا تَقَدَّمَ مِن ذَنۢبِكَ وَمَا تَأَخَّرَ وَيُتِمَّ نِعْمَتَهُۥ عَلَيْكَ وَيَهْدِيَكَ صِرَٰطًۭا مُّسْتَقِيمًۭا

verse_en: And help you with surpassing help.
verse_ar: وَيَنصُرَكَ ٱللَّهُ نَصْرًا عَزِيزًا

verse_en: It is He who sent down the sense of security into the hearts of believers so that their faith may increase with belief, -- God's are the armies of the heavens and the earth; and God is all-knowing and all-wise; --
verse_ar: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ ٱلسَّكِينَةَ فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ لِيَزْدَادُوٓا۟ إِيمَٰنًۭا مَّعَ إِيمَٰنِهِمْ ۗ وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًۭا

verse_en: And that He may admit men and women who believe into gardens with rivers running by, to live for ever there, and absolve their evil, -- This, in the sight of God, will be the great fulfilment --
verse_ar: لِّيُدْخِلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ جَنَّٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا وَيُكَفِّرَ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ ۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ فَوْزًا عَظِيمًۭا

verse_en: And that He may punish men and women (who are) hypocrites, and idolaters and idolatresses who entertain evil notions of God: It is against them that the wheel of misfortune will turn, and God will be wroth with them, and condemn them. For them He has prepared Hell, an evil destination!
verse_ar: وَيُعَذِّبَ ٱلْمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱلْمُنَٰفِقَٰتِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ وَٱلْمُشْرِكَٰتِ ٱلظَّآنِّينَ بِٱللَّهِ ظَنَّ ٱلسَّوْءِ ۚ عَلَيْهِمْ دَآئِرَةُ ٱلسَّوْءِ ۖ وَغَضِبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَعَنَهُمْ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمْ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَسَآءَتْ مَصِيرًۭا

verse_en: For God's are the armies of the heavens and the earth; and God is all-knowing and all-wise.
verse_ar: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا

verse_en: We have sent you as witness (of the truth) and harbinger of good news and a warner,
verse_ar: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَٰكَ شَٰهِدًۭا وَمُبَشِّرًۭا وَنَذِيرًۭا

verse_en: So that (men) may believe in God and His Apostle, and honour Him and revere Him, and sing His praises morning and evening.
verse_ar: لِّتُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَتُعَزِّرُوهُ وَتُوَقِّرُوهُ وَتُسَبِّحُوهُ بُكْرَةًۭ وَأَصِيلًا

verse_en: Those who swear allegiance to you indeed swear allegiance to God; and God's protection is over them. Then whosoever breaks the promise breaks it to his own loss; but whosoever fulfills the promise made to God will receive a great reward from Him.
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَايِعُونَكَ إِنَّمَا يُبَايِعُونَ ٱللَّهَ يَدُ ٱللَّهِ فَوْقَ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۚ فَمَن نَّكَثَ فَإِنَّمَا يَنكُثُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَنْ أَوْفَىٰ بِمَا عَٰهَدَ عَلَيْهُ ٱللَّهَ فَسَيُؤْتِيهِ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًۭا

verse_en: The Arabs of the desert who had stayed behind will now say to you: "We were occupied with our flocks and herds and families, so ask forgiveness for us. They say with their tongues what is not in their hearts. Tell them: "Who can prevail with God for you if He wish you harm or benefit? Surely God is well aware of what you do.
verse_ar: سَيَقُولُ لَكَ ٱلْمُخَلَّفُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ شَغَلَتْنَآ أَمْوَٰلُنَا وَأَهْلُونَا فَٱسْتَغْفِرْ لَنَا ۚ يَقُولُونَ بِأَلْسِنَتِهِم مَّا لَيْسَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ ۚ قُلْ فَمَن يَمْلِكُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًٔا إِنْ أَرَادَ بِكُمْ ضَرًّا أَوْ أَرَادَ بِكُمْ نَفْعًۢا ۚ بَلْ كَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًۢا

verse_en: In fact you imagined that the Prophet and the faithful would never come back home; and this seemed pleasing to your hearts, and you entertained evil thoughts. You are a people lost.
verse_ar: بَلْ ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَنقَلِبَ ٱلرَّسُولُ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِيهِمْ أَبَدًۭا وَزُيِّنَ ذَٰلِكَ فِى قُلُوبِكُمْ وَظَنَنتُمْ ظَنَّ ٱلسَّوْءِ وَكُنتُمْ قَوْمًۢا بُورًۭا

verse_en: He who does not believe in God and His Apostle (should know) We have prepared for unbelievers a blazing fire."
verse_ar: وَمَن لَّمْ يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ فَإِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَٰفِرِينَ سَعِيرًۭا

verse_en: To God belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth; He may forgive whosoever He please, and afflict whosoever He will. Yet God is forgiving and kind.
verse_ar: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ يَغْفِرُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا

verse_en: Those who had stayed behind will say: "When you depart for taking the spoils, allow us to follow you." They wish to change the word of God. Tell them: "You will not follow us. That is what God has already said before." They will say: "You are envious of our gain." The fact is they understand but little.
verse_ar: سَيَقُولُ ٱلْمُخَلَّفُونَ إِذَا ٱنطَلَقْتُمْ إِلَىٰ مَغَانِمَ لِتَأْخُذُوهَا ذَرُونَا نَتَّبِعْكُمْ ۖ يُرِيدُونَ أَن يُبَدِّلُوا۟ كَلَٰمَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ قُل لَّن تَتَّبِعُونَا كَذَٰلِكُمْ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ فَسَيَقُولُونَ بَلْ تَحْسُدُونَنَا ۚ بَلْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَفْقَهُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا

verse_en: Say to the desert Arabs who had stayed behind: "You will be called against a formidable people. You will fight them till they surrender. If you obey, then He will give you a good reward; but if you turn back, as you had done before, He will punish you with a grievous affliction."
verse_ar: قُل لِّلْمُخَلَّفِينَ مِنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ سَتُدْعَوْنَ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ أُو۟لِى بَأْسٍۢ شَدِيدٍۢ تُقَٰتِلُونَهُمْ أَوْ يُسْلِمُونَ ۖ فَإِن تُطِيعُوا۟ يُؤْتِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَجْرًا حَسَنًۭا ۖ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوْا۟ كَمَا تَوَلَّيْتُم مِّن قَبْلُ يُعَذِّبْكُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا

verse_en: It is not binding on the blind, the lame or the sick (to follow this command); but those who obey God and His Apostle will be admitted by God to gardens with running streams; but those who turn back will suffer a painful doom.
verse_ar: لَّيْسَ عَلَى ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ حَرَجٌۭ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْأَعْرَجِ حَرَجٌۭ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْمَرِيضِ حَرَجٌۭ ۗ وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ يُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ ۖ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ يُعَذِّبْهُ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا

verse_en: God was pleased with the believers when they swore allegiance to you under the tree, for He knew well what was in their hearts, and sent down tranquility on them, and rewarded them with an expeditious victory
verse_ar: ۞ لَّقَدْ رَضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ إِذْ يُبَايِعُونَكَ تَحْتَ ٱلشَّجَرَةِ فَعَلِمَ مَا فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ فَأَنزَلَ ٱلسَّكِينَةَ عَلَيْهِمْ وَأَثَٰبَهُمْ فَتْحًۭا قَرِيبًۭا

verse_en: And the many spoils that they were to take. God is all-mighty and all-wise.
verse_ar: وَمَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةًۭ يَأْخُذُونَهَا ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًۭا

verse_en: God had promised you many spoils that you would capture; so He gave this soon enough to you, and stayed the hands of men from you that it may serve as a sign for believers, and guide you on the straight path;
verse_ar: وَعَدَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ مَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةًۭ تَأْخُذُونَهَا فَعَجَّلَ لَكُمْ هَٰذِهِۦ وَكَفَّ أَيْدِىَ ٱلنَّاسِ عَنكُمْ وَلِتَكُونَ ءَايَةًۭ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَيَهْدِيَكُمْ صِرَٰطًۭا مُّسْتَقِيمًۭا

verse_en: And other (benefits) which you have not yet obtained, are within the compass of God, for God has power over everything.
verse_ar: وَأُخْرَىٰ لَمْ تَقْدِرُوا۟ عَلَيْهَا قَدْ أَحَاطَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرًۭا

verse_en: Had the unbelievers fought you they would have turned their backs and not found a protector or helper.
verse_ar: وَلَوْ قَٰتَلَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوَلَّوُا۟ ٱلْأَدْبَٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيًّۭا وَلَا نَصِيرًۭا

verse_en: This is the law of God, effective as before: You will not find any change in the law of God.
verse_ar: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِى قَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًۭا

verse_en: It was He who restrained their hands from you in the heart of Makkah, and your hands from them, after He had given you victory over them, as God sees all that you do.
verse_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى كَفَّ أَيْدِيَهُمْ عَنكُمْ وَأَيْدِيَكُمْ عَنْهُم بِبَطْنِ مَكَّةَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ أَنْ أَظْفَرَكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرًا

verse_en: It were those who disbelieved who hindered you from (going to) the Holy Mosque, preventing your offerings from arriving at the place of sacrifice. Had it not been for (the presence of) believers, men and women, (among the unbelievers) of whom you were unaware, and whom you might have trampled and thus incurred guilt unknowingly on account of them, (the matter would have been settled). (But this was not done) so that God may admit into His favour whom He willed. If these (believers) had been separated from them, He would have inflicted a grievous punishment on the unbelievers.
verse_ar: هُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَصَدُّوكُمْ عَنِ ٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ وَٱلْهَدْىَ مَعْكُوفًا أَن يَبْلُغَ مَحِلَّهُۥ ۚ وَلَوْلَا رِجَالٌۭ مُّؤْمِنُونَ وَنِسَآءٌۭ مُّؤْمِنَٰتٌۭ لَّمْ تَعْلَمُوهُمْ أَن تَطَـُٔوهُمْ فَتُصِيبَكُم مِّنْهُم مَّعَرَّةٌۢ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍۢ ۖ لِّيُدْخِلَ ٱللَّهُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ لَوْ تَزَيَّلُوا۟ لَعَذَّبْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

verse_en: When the unbelievers fostered a sense of honour in their hearts, a sense of pagan honour, God sent down a sense of tranquility on His Apostle and the believers, and obliged them to an act of self-restraint, for they were deserving and worthy of it. God is cognisant of everything.
verse_ar: إِذْ جَعَلَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلْحَمِيَّةَ حَمِيَّةَ ٱلْجَٰهِلِيَّةِ فَأَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ وَعَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَأَلْزَمَهُمْ كَلِمَةَ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَكَانُوٓا۟ أَحَقَّ بِهَا وَأَهْلَهَا ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمًۭا

verse_en: God has truly made the vision of His Apostle come true: You will surely enter the Holy Mosque in security if God please, without any fear, having shaved your heads and cut your hair. He knew what you did not know, and has vouchsafed you, apart from this, a victory near at hand.
verse_ar: لَّقَدْ صَدَقَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولَهُ ٱلرُّءْيَا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ لَتَدْخُلُنَّ ٱلْمَسْجِدَ ٱلْحَرَامَ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ءَامِنِينَ مُحَلِّقِينَ رُءُوسَكُمْ وَمُقَصِّرِينَ لَا تَخَافُونَ ۖ فَعَلِمَ مَا لَمْ تَعْلَمُوا۟ فَجَعَلَ مِن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ فَتْحًۭا قَرِيبًا

verse_en: It is He who has sent His Apostle with the guidance and the true faith, so that He may exalt it over every other creed. God is sufficient as a witness.
verse_ar: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ رَسُولَهُۥ بِٱلْهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ ٱلْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلدِّينِ كُلِّهِۦ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدًۭا

verse_en: Muhammad is the Prophet of God; and those who are with him are severe with infidels but compassionate among themselves. You may see them kneeling and bowing in reverence, seeking His favour and acceptance. Their mark is on their foreheads from the effect of prostrations. Their likeness in the Torah, and their likeness in the Gospel, is like a seed that sends out a stalk, then makes it firm, and it becomes strong and rises straight upon its stem, gladdening the cultivator's heart, in order to fill the unbelievers with dismay. God has promised those who believe and do the right forgiveness and a great reward.
verse_ar: مُّحَمَّدٌۭ رَّسُولُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ مَعَهُۥٓ أَشِدَّآءُ عَلَى ٱلْكُفَّارِ رُحَمَآءُ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ تَرَىٰهُمْ رُكَّعًۭا سُجَّدًۭا يَبْتَغُونَ فَضْلًۭا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضْوَٰنًۭا ۖ سِيمَاهُمْ فِى وُجُوهِهِم مِّنْ أَثَرِ ٱلسُّجُودِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ مَثَلُهُمْ فِى ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةِ ۚ وَمَثَلُهُمْ فِى ٱلْإِنجِيلِ كَزَرْعٍ أَخْرَجَ شَطْـَٔهُۥ فَـَٔازَرَهُۥ فَٱسْتَغْلَظَ فَٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَىٰ سُوقِهِۦ يُعْجِبُ ٱلزُّرَّاعَ لِيَغِيظَ بِهِمُ ٱلْكُفَّارَ ۗ وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ مِنْهُم مَّغْفِرَةًۭ وَأَجْرًا عَظِيمًۢا

verse_en: O YOU WHO believe, do not forestall the judgements of God and His Apostle, and have fear of God. Verily God hears all and knows everything.
verse_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ بَيْنَ يَدَىِ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۖ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ

verse_en: O you who believe, do not raise your voices above the voice of the Prophet, and do not speak loudly to him as you do with one another lest your deeds are nullified unconsciously.
verse_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَرْفَعُوٓا۟ أَصْوَٰتَكُمْ فَوْقَ صَوْتِ ٱلنَّبِىِّ وَلَا تَجْهَرُوا۟ لَهُۥ بِٱلْقَوْلِ كَجَهْرِ بَعْضِكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ أَن تَحْبَطَ أَعْمَٰلُكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ

verse_en: They who speak in a low voice in the presence of God's Apostle, have had their hearts tried by God for reverence. There is forgiveness for them and a great reward.
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَغُضُّونَ أَصْوَٰتَهُمْ عِندَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱمْتَحَنَ ٱللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُمْ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ ۚ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌۭ وَأَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ

verse_en: Many of those who call you from outside the apartments are not considerate.
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَآءِ ٱلْحُجُرَٰتِ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ

verse_en: If they had waited for you to come out it would have been better for them. But God is forgiving and kind.
verse_ar: وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ صَبَرُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ تَخْرُجَ إِلَيْهِمْ لَكَانَ خَيْرًۭا لَّهُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ

verse_en: O you who believe, if a dissolute person brings some news, verify it first lest you attack a people ignorantly and later regret what you had done.
verse_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِن جَآءَكُمْ فَاسِقٌۢ بِنَبَإٍۢ فَتَبَيَّنُوٓا۟ أَن تُصِيبُوا۟ قَوْمًۢا بِجَهَٰلَةٍۢ فَتُصْبِحُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَا فَعَلْتُمْ نَٰدِمِينَ

verse_en: Know that the Apostle of God is among you: If he agreed with you in most matters you would surely come to grief. But God has made faith more desirable to you, and attractive to your hearts, and rendered disbelief and sin and disobedience repugnant. They are those who are well directed
verse_ar: وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ فِيكُمْ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ لَوْ يُطِيعُكُمْ فِى كَثِيرٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْأَمْرِ لَعَنِتُّمْ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ حَبَّبَ إِلَيْكُمُ ٱلْإِيمَٰنَ وَزَيَّنَهُۥ فِى قُلُوبِكُمْ وَكَرَّهَ إِلَيْكُمُ ٱلْكُفْرَ وَٱلْفُسُوقَ وَٱلْعِصْيَانَ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلرَّٰشِدُونَ

verse_en: By God's benevolence and His grace. God is all-knowing and all-wise.
verse_ar: فَضْلًۭا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَنِعْمَةًۭ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ

verse_en: If two groups of believers come to fight one another, promote peace between them. Then if one of them turns aggressive against the other, fight against the aggressive party till it returns to God's authority. If it does so, make peace among them equitably and be impartial. Verily God loves those who are just.
verse_ar: وَإِن طَآئِفَتَانِ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ٱقْتَتَلُوا۟ فَأَصْلِحُوا۟ بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَإِنۢ بَغَتْ إِحْدَىٰهُمَا عَلَى ٱلْأُخْرَىٰ فَقَٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلَّتِى تَبْغِى حَتَّىٰ تَفِىٓءَ إِلَىٰٓ أَمْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ فَإِن فَآءَتْ فَأَصْلِحُوا۟ بَيْنَهُمَا بِٱلْعَدْلِ وَأَقْسِطُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُقْسِطِينَ

verse_en: The faithful are surely brothers; so restore friendship among your brothers, and fear God that you may be favoured.
verse_ar: إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِخْوَةٌۭ فَأَصْلِحُوا۟ بَيْنَ أَخَوَيْكُمْ ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ

verse_en: O you who believe, men should not laugh at other men, for it may be they are better than them; and women should not laugh at other women, for they may perhaps be better than them. Do not slander one another, nor give one another nick-names. After believing, it is bad to give (another) a bad name. Those who do not repent behave wickedly.
verse_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا يَسْخَرْ قَوْمٌۭ مِّن قَوْمٍ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونُوا۟ خَيْرًۭا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا نِسَآءٌۭ مِّن نِّسَآءٍ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُنَّ خَيْرًۭا مِّنْهُنَّ ۖ وَلَا تَلْمِزُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمْ وَلَا تَنَابَزُوا۟ بِٱلْأَلْقَٰبِ ۖ بِئْسَ ٱلِٱسْمُ ٱلْفُسُوقُ بَعْدَ ٱلْإِيمَٰنِ ۚ وَمَن لَّمْ يَتُبْ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

verse_en: O you who believe, avoid most suspicions: Some suspicions are indeed sins. So do not pry into others' secrets and do not backbite. Would any of you like to eat a dead brother's flesh? You would surely be revolted by it Then fear God. He is certainly forgiving and kind.
verse_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱجْتَنِبُوا۟ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلظَّنِّ إِنَّ بَعْضَ ٱلظَّنِّ إِثْمٌۭ ۖ وَلَا تَجَسَّسُوا۟ وَلَا يَغْتَب بَّعْضُكُم بَعْضًا ۚ أَيُحِبُّ أَحَدُكُمْ أَن يَأْكُلَ لَحْمَ أَخِيهِ مَيْتًۭا فَكَرِهْتُمُوهُ ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ تَوَّابٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ

verse_en: O men, We created you from a male and female, and formed you into nations and tribes that you may recognise each other. He who has more integrity has indeed greater honour with God. Surely God is all-knowing and well-informed.
verse_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَٰكُم مِّن ذَكَرٍۢ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلْنَٰكُمْ شُعُوبًۭا وَقَبَآئِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَتْقَىٰكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٌۭ

verse_en: The Arabs of the desert say: "We believe." Tell them: "You do not believe. Better say: 'We submit'; for belief has not yet penetrated your hearts." If you begin to obey God and His Apostle, He will not withhold the least (of the recompense) of your labour. Verily God is forgiving and kind."
verse_ar: ۞ قَالَتِ ٱلْأَعْرَابُ ءَامَنَّا ۖ قُل لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ وَلَٰكِن قُولُوٓا۟ أَسْلَمْنَا وَلَمَّا يَدْخُلِ ٱلْإِيمَٰنُ فِى قُلُوبِكُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ لَا يَلِتْكُم مِّنْ أَعْمَٰلِكُمْ شَيْـًٔا ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌ

verse_en: They alone are believers who come to believe in God and His Apostle, then never doubt again, and struggle wealth and soul in the way of God. They are the truthful and sincere.
verse_ar: إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَرْتَابُوا۟ وَجَٰهَدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصَّٰدِقُونَ

verse_en: Say: "Are you trying to convince God of your faithfulness? But God knows all there is in the heavens and the earth, for God has knowledge of everything."
verse_ar: قُلْ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ ٱللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمْ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۭ

verse_en: They impress upon you that they have submitted. Tell them: "Do not favour me with your submission. In fact God has favoured you by showing you the way to belief, if you are men of truth."
verse_ar: يَمُنُّونَ عَلَيْكَ أَنْ أَسْلَمُوا۟ ۖ قُل لَّا تَمُنُّوا۟ عَلَىَّ إِسْلَٰمَكُم ۖ بَلِ ٱللَّهُ يَمُنُّ عَلَيْكُمْ أَنْ هَدَىٰكُمْ لِلْإِيمَٰنِ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ

verse_en: Verily God knows the unknown of the heavens and the earth; and God perceives all you do.
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ غَيْبَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ

verse_en: QAF. I CALL to witness the glorious Qur'an.
verse_ar: قٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْمَجِيدِ

verse_en: They are rather surprised that a warner from among themselves has come to them. So the unbelievers say: "This is astonishing:
verse_ar: بَلْ عَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا شَىْءٌ عَجِيبٌ

verse_en: When we are dead and turned to dust, this returning (to life) is most far-fetched."
verse_ar: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًۭا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌۢ بَعِيدٌۭ

verse_en: We know what the earth consumes of them, for We have the Book that preserves everything.
verse_ar: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَٰبٌ حَفِيظٌۢ

verse_en: But no! They called the truth a lie when it came to them; so they are in a confused state.
verse_ar: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِىٓ أَمْرٍۢ مَّرِيجٍ

verse_en: Have they not looked at the sky above them, how We have fashioned and adorned it, and it has no flaw?
verse_ar: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍۢ

verse_en: We stretched the earth and placed upon it firm stabilisers and We made every kind of splendid thing to grow upon it
verse_ar: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۭ بَهِيجٍۢ

verse_en: As instruction and reminder to every penitent creature.
verse_ar: تَبْصِرَةًۭ وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍۢ مُّنِيبٍۢ

verse_en: And We send down water as a blessing from the sky, and grow gardens with it and the grain for harvest,
verse_ar: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءًۭ مُّبَٰرَكًۭا فَأَنۢبَتْنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَحَبَّ ٱلْحَصِيدِ

verse_en: And tall date-palms with their spathes pile on pile
verse_ar: وَٱلنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَٰتٍۢ لَّهَا طَلْعٌۭ نَّضِيدٌۭ

verse_en: As a provision for men, and enlivened a region that was dead. Even thus will be the life after death.
verse_ar: رِّزْقًۭا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِۦ بَلْدَةًۭ مَّيْتًۭا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْخُرُوجُ

verse_en: The people of Noah, Ar-Rass and Thamud denied before you,
verse_ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍۢ وَأَصْحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ

verse_en: As did the people of 'Ad and Pharaoh and the brethren of Lot,
verse_ar: وَعَادٌۭ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَٰنُ لُوطٍۢ

verse_en: And the dwellers of the Wood and people of Tubba'. Each of them denied the apostles. So My threat became a reality.
verse_ar: وَأَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍۢ ۚ كُلٌّۭ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ

verse_en: Were We exhausted by the act of the first creation? And yet they are confused about a new creation.
verse_ar: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلْخَلْقِ ٱلْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى لَبْسٍۢ مِّنْ خَلْقٍۢ جَدِيدٍۢ

verse_en: He created man and surely know what misdoubts arise in their hearts; for We are closer to him than his jugular vein.
verse_ar: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفْسُهُۥ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ

verse_en: When the two (angels) who keep the account, one sitting on the right, one on the left, take it down,
verse_ar: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌۭ

verse_en: There is not a word he utters but an observer is ready (to make note of it).
verse_ar: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌۭ

verse_en: The palsy of death will surely come. This is what you wished to avert.
verse_ar: وَجَآءَتْ سَكْرَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ

verse_en: And the trumpet blast will sound: It would be the Day of Doom.
verse_ar: وَنُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْوَعِيدِ

verse_en: Each soul will come with a driver and a witness.
verse_ar: وَجَآءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٌۭ وَشَهِيدٌۭ

verse_en: (And the driver will say:) "You were oblivious of this, so we have removed the veil, and how keen is your sight today!"
verse_ar: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِى غَفْلَةٍۢ مِّنْ هَٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌۭ

verse_en: His companion will say: "Here is (the record) I have ready with me."
verse_ar: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَىَّ عَتِيدٌ

verse_en: "Cast each stubborn unbeliever into Hell," (they will be told),
verse_ar: أَلْقِيَا فِى جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍۢ

verse_en: "Every obstructor of good, transgressor, and the sceptic,
verse_ar: مَّنَّاعٍۢ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍۢ مُّرِيبٍ

verse_en: Who had set up another god with God. Cast him into severe torment."
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ

verse_en: His companion will say: "O Lord, I did not lead him to wickedness, but he was himself far astray."
verse_ar: ۞ قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطْغَيْتُهُۥ وَلَٰكِن كَانَ فِى ضَلَٰلٍۭ بَعِيدٍۢ

verse_en: "Do not argue in My presence. I had announced the promise of doom in advance.
verse_ar: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا۟ لَدَىَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِٱلْوَعِيدِ

verse_en: There is no changing of My word, nor am I unjust to My creatures."
verse_ar: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلْقَوْلُ لَدَىَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّٰمٍۢ لِّلْعَبِيدِ

verse_en: We shall ask Hell that day: "Are you full?" It will answer: "Are there still more?"
verse_ar: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍۢ

verse_en: And Paradise will be brought near, not far from those who took heed for themselves and feared God.
verse_ar: وَأُزْلِفَتِ ٱلْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ

verse_en: "This is what you had been promised," (will be said) to every penitent who remembered (his duty),
verse_ar: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍۢ

verse_en: Who feared Ar-Rahman in secret, and came with a penitent heart:
verse_ar: مَّنْ خَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلْبٍۢ مُّنِيبٍ

verse_en: "Enter it in peace. This is the day of life abiding."
verse_ar: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَٰمٍۢ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُلُودِ

verse_en: Theirs will be whatsoever they wish: And with Us there is more.
verse_ar: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌۭ

verse_en: How many generations have We destroyed before them who were mightier in power than they. Then they searched throughout the land to see if there was a way of escape.
verse_ar: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًۭا فَنَقَّبُوا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ

verse_en: Surely there is a reminder in this for whosoever has a heart (to feel), or takes heed.
verse_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى ٱلسَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌۭ

verse_en: We created the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, in six spans, and no weariness came upon Us.
verse_ar: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍۢ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍۢ

verse_en: So you bear with patience what they say, and sing the praises of your Lord before the rising of the sun and its setting,
verse_ar: فَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ ٱلْغُرُوبِ

verse_en: And glorify Him for some portion of the night, and additional adorations.
verse_ar: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ

verse_en: Take heed that the day the crier calls from a place close (to every one),
verse_ar: وَٱسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ ٱلْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍۢ قَرِيبٍۢ

verse_en: The day they actually hear the blast, will be the Day of rising of the dead.
verse_ar: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيْحَةَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ ٱلْخُرُوجِ

verse_en: We are the one who give life and death, and to Us will be the destination.
verse_ar: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا ٱلْمَصِيرُ

verse_en: The day the earth will split asunder they will come out hurriedly. This gathering together is easy for Us.
verse_ar: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًۭا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌۭ

verse_en: We are cognisant of what they say; but it is not for you to compel them. So keep on reminding through the Qur'an whoever fears My warning.
verse_ar: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍۢ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِٱلْقُرْءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ

verse_en: I CALL TO witness those who scatter (dust) by dispersing,
verse_ar: وَٱلذَّٰرِيَٰتِ ذَرْوًۭا

verse_en: And those who bear the load (of rain),
verse_ar: فَٱلْحَٰمِلَٰتِ وِقْرًۭا

verse_en: And those who move (on the water) gently,
verse_ar: فَٱلْجَٰرِيَٰتِ يُسْرًۭا

verse_en: And those who distribute (it) by command,
verse_ar: فَٱلْمُقَسِّمَٰتِ أَمْرًا

verse_en: Verily the promise made to you is true:
verse_ar: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌۭ

verse_en: The Judgement will indeed take place.
verse_ar: وَإِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ لَوَٰقِعٌۭ

verse_en: The heavens webbed-with-tracks is witness
verse_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْحُبُكِ

verse_en: You are surely caught in contradictions.,
verse_ar: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِى قَوْلٍۢ مُّخْتَلِفٍۢ

verse_en: From which only he turns who is turned away.
verse_ar: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ

verse_en: Perish will those who just guess and speculate,
verse_ar: قُتِلَ ٱلْخَرَّٰصُونَ

verse_en: Who are lost in deception.
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍۢ سَاهُونَ

verse_en: They ask: "When is the Day of Judgement?" --
verse_ar: يَسْـَٔلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ

verse_en: The day they will be burnt in the Fire,
verse_ar: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ

verse_en: (And told:) "Taste your punishment. This is what you were trying to hasten."
verse_ar: ذُوقُوا۟ فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ

verse_en: Surely those who fear God and follow the straight path will be amidst gardens and fresh springs of water,
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَعُيُونٍ

verse_en: Receiving what is given them by their Lord. They were surely the virtuous before this.
verse_ar: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ

verse_en: They slept little in the night,
verse_ar: كَانُوا۟ قَلِيلًۭا مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ

verse_en: And every morning asked forgiveness,
verse_ar: وَبِٱلْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ

verse_en: In whose wealth the suppliant and the deprived had a share.
verse_ar: وَفِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّۭ لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ

verse_en: There are signs in the earth for those who are firm in their faith,
verse_ar: وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ءَايَٰتٌۭ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ

verse_en: And within yourselves. Can you not perceive?
verse_ar: وَفِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ

verse_en: There is in the heavens your sustenance, and whatever has been promised you.
verse_ar: وَفِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ

verse_en: By the Lord of the heavens and the earth, this is certainly true even as you speak.
verse_ar: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقٌّۭ مِّثْلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ

verse_en: Has the story of Abraham's honoured guests come to you?
verse_ar: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ

verse_en: When they came to him, they said: "Peace." He answered: "Peace." They were a people he did not recognise.
verse_ar: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَٰمًۭا ۖ قَالَ سَلَٰمٌۭ قَوْمٌۭ مُّنكَرُونَ

verse_en: So he hurried to the house and brought a fatted calf,
verse_ar: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجْلٍۢ سَمِينٍۢ

verse_en: And placing it before them said: "Won't you eat?"
verse_ar: فَقَرَّبَهُۥٓ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ

verse_en: He felt afraid of them; but they said: "Have no fear," and gave him the good news of a wise son.
verse_ar: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةًۭ ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٍۢ

verse_en: His wife came out lamenting, striking her forehead, and said: "I, am old and barren woman?"
verse_ar: فَأَقْبَلَتِ ٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ فِى صَرَّةٍۢ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌۭ

verse_en: They said: "Thus said your Lord. He is indeed all-wise and all-knowing."
verse_ar: قَالُوا۟ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

verse_en: He said: "What is then your business, O messengers?"
verse_ar: ۞ قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ

verse_en: They said: "We have been sent to a wicked people
verse_ar: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍۢ مُّجْرِمِينَ

verse_en: So as to let loose clods of clay on them
verse_ar: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةًۭ مِّن طِينٍۢ

verse_en: Marked by your Lord for those who waste their substance."
verse_ar: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ

verse_en: So We evacuated everyone who was a believer there,
verse_ar: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

verse_en: But did not find more than a single family of believers.
verse_ar: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ

verse_en: We left a sign in this for those who fear the grievous punishment,
verse_ar: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةًۭ لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ

verse_en: As (there was) in Moses when We sent him to the Pharaoh with clear authority.
verse_ar: وَفِى مُوسَىٰٓ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَٰنٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ

verse_en: But he turned to his counsellors, and said: "He is a magician or lunatic."
verse_ar: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌۭ

verse_en: So We seized him and his armies, and threw them into the sea, for he was worthy of blame.
verse_ar: فَأَخَذْنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذْنَٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌۭ

verse_en: In 'Ad (also is a sign), when We sent a blasting wind against them,
verse_ar: وَفِى عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلْعَقِيمَ

verse_en: Which turned everything it touched to ashes.
verse_ar: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَىْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ

verse_en: And in Thamud, when We said to them: "Enjoy yourselves for a while;"
verse_ar: وَفِى ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍۢ

verse_en: But they disobeyed the command of their Lord; so they were destroyed by a thunderbolt, and they could only gape,
verse_ar: فَعَتَوْا۟ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّٰعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ

verse_en: And neither stand up nor defend themselves.
verse_ar: فَمَا ٱسْتَطَٰعُوا۟ مِن قِيَامٍۢ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنتَصِرِينَ

verse_en: (So had We destroyed) the people of Noah before them: They were surely a sinful people.
verse_ar: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍۢ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًۭا فَٰسِقِينَ

verse_en: We built the heavens by Our authority; and We are the Lord of power and expanse.
verse_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بَنَيْنَٰهَا بِأَيْي۟دٍۢ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ

verse_en: We spread the earth a carpet; what comfort We provide!
verse_ar: وَٱلْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَٰهَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَٰهِدُونَ

verse_en: And We created pairs of everything that you may contemplate.
verse_ar: وَمِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ

verse_en: So turn to God. I give you a clear warning from Him.
verse_ar: فَفِرُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ

verse_en: Do not set up another god with God. I give you a clear warning from Him.
verse_ar: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ

verse_en: Even thus no apostle came to those before them but they said: "He is a sorcerer or a mad man."
verse_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا۟ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ

verse_en: Is this the legacy they have passed down from one to the other? In fact, they are a rebellious people.
verse_ar: أَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِهِۦ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌۭ طَاغُونَ

verse_en: Turn away from them. You will not be blamed.
verse_ar: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍۢ

verse_en: But go on reminding them, as reminding benefits the believers.
verse_ar: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

verse_en: I have not created the jinns and men but to worship Me.
verse_ar: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ ٱلْجِنَّ وَٱلْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ

verse_en: I want no sustenance from them nor do I want them to feed Me.
verse_ar: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍۢ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ

verse_en: God is certainly the great provider, Lord of strength and power.
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلْقُوَّةِ ٱلْمَتِينُ

verse_en: Those who do wrong will indeed come to the same end as their fellows (of old). So let them not ask Me to hasten (the punishment).
verse_ar: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذَنُوبًۭا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَٰبِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ

verse_en: Alas the woe for those who refuse to believe in the Day which has been promised them.
verse_ar: فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن يَوْمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ

verse_en: I CALL TO witness the Mount Sinai,
verse_ar: وَٱلطُّورِ

verse_en: And the Scripture inscribed
verse_ar: وَكِتَٰبٍۢ مَّسْطُورٍۢ

verse_en: On a parchment scroll unrolled,
verse_ar: فِى رَقٍّۢ مَّنشُورٍۢ

verse_en: The house ever-peopled,
verse_ar: وَٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْمَعْمُورِ

verse_en: The roof raised high,
verse_ar: وَٱلسَّقْفِ ٱلْمَرْفُوعِ

verse_en: And the swollen sea,
verse_ar: وَٱلْبَحْرِ ٱلْمَسْجُورِ

verse_en: The punishment of your Lord is certain to come.
verse_ar: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٌۭ

verse_en: There is none who could avert it.
verse_ar: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٍۢ

verse_en: The day the sky will tremble,
verse_ar: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوْرًۭا

verse_en: The mountains move and fly away,
verse_ar: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلْجِبَالُ سَيْرًۭا

verse_en: Will be the day of woe for those
verse_ar: فَوَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verse_en: Who, ignoring the Reality, engage in pleasantries.
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى خَوْضٍۢ يَلْعَبُونَ

verse_en: The day they are dragged and pushed into Hell,
verse_ar: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا

verse_en: (And told:) "This is the fire which you denied.
verse_ar: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

verse_en: Is it magic, or you cannot see?
verse_ar: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ

verse_en: Roast in it. Bear it with patience or impatience, it will be the same for you. You will be requited for what you had done."
verse_ar: ٱصْلَوْهَا فَٱصْبِرُوٓا۟ أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

verse_en: Those who fear God and follow the straight path will surely be in gardens and in bliss,
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَنَعِيمٍۢ

verse_en: Rejoicing at what their Lord has given them; and their Lord will preserve them from the torment of Hell.
verse_ar: فَٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

verse_en: "Eat and drink with relish," (they will be told), (as recompense) for what you had done."
verse_ar: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

verse_en: They would recline on couches set in rows, paired with fair companions (clean of thought and) bright of eye.
verse_ar: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍۢ مَّصْفُوفَةٍۢ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍۢ

verse_en: And those who believed, and whose progeny also followed them in their faith, will be united with their offspring. We will not deprive them of their labour in the least. Every man is bound to what he does.
verse_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَٰنٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَآ أَلَتْنَٰهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَىْءٍۢ ۚ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌۭ

verse_en: We shall give them fruits and meats, and what they desire.
verse_ar: وَأَمْدَدْنَٰهُم بِفَٰكِهَةٍۢ وَلَحْمٍۢ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ

verse_en: They will exchange cups of wine free of (incitement to) pleasantry or sin.
verse_ar: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًۭا لَّا لَغْوٌۭ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌۭ

verse_en: And young attendants like pearls within their shells, will go round.
verse_ar: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌۭ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌۭ مَّكْنُونٌۭ

verse_en: They will ask each other questions,
verse_ar: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

verse_en: Saying: "We were also once full of fear at home.
verse_ar: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِىٓ أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ

verse_en: But God has been gracious to us, and has saved us from the torment of scorching wind.
verse_ar: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ

verse_en: We used to pray to Him erstwhile; He is the just and merciful.
verse_ar: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

verse_en: Remind them, therefore, that by the grace of your Lord you are neither a soothsayer nor possessed.
verse_ar: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍۢ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ

verse_en: Do they say: "He is a poet for whom we expect an adverse turn of fortune?"
verse_ar: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌۭ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيْبَ ٱلْمَنُونِ

verse_en: Tell them: "Keep on expecting, I am expecting with you."
verse_ar: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّى مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

verse_en: Does their reasoning prompt them to this, or they are a people rebellious?
verse_ar: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَٰمُهُم بِهَٰذَآ ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌۭ طَاغُونَ

verse_en: Or do they say: "He has fabricated it?" In fact, they will never believe.
verse_ar: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ

verse_en: So let them bring a discourse like it, if they are truthful
verse_ar: فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِحَدِيثٍۢ مِّثْلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَٰدِقِينَ

verse_en: Or were they created of themselves? Or are they the creators?
verse_ar: أَمْ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنْ غَيْرِ شَىْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْخَٰلِقُونَ

verse_en: Or have they created the heavens and the earth? In fact they are certain of nothing.
verse_ar: أَمْ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

verse_en: Do they possess the treasures of your Lord? Or are they the treasurers?
verse_ar: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُصَۣيْطِرُونَ

verse_en: Or do they have a ladder (climbing which) they can hear (the secrets of heaven)? Let one who has heard then bring a clear proof.
verse_ar: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌۭ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَٰنٍۢ مُّبِينٍ

verse_en: Has (God) daughters and they sons?
verse_ar: أَمْ لَهُ ٱلْبَنَٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْبَنُونَ

verse_en: Or do you demand any wages from them so that they are burdened with expense?
verse_ar: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًۭا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍۢ مُّثْقَلُونَ

verse_en: Or do they have knowledge of the Unknown which they write down?
verse_ar: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ

verse_en: Or do they want to stage a deception? -- Then only those who do not believe will be the ones who will be tricked.
verse_ar: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًۭا ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلْمَكِيدُونَ

verse_en: Or do they have a god apart from God? He is too exalted for what they associate with Him!
verse_ar: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ

verse_en: If they should see a segment falling from the sky, they would say: "It is only a massive cloud."
verse_ar: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ كِسْفًۭا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطًۭا يَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابٌۭ مَّرْكُومٌۭ

verse_en: So, leave them until they face their day (of doom) when they will be stunned.
verse_ar: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ

verse_en: Their deception will not avail them in the least on that day, nor will they be helped.
verse_ar: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ

verse_en: Surely there are other torments besides this for those who are wicked, though most of them do not know.
verse_ar: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابًۭا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

verse_en: Await the judgement of your Lord, for you are always before Our eyes, and glorify your Lord with praises when you rise,
verse_ar: وَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ

verse_en: And glorify Him in the night and when the stars begin to wane.
verse_ar: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ

verse_en: I CALL TO witness the star of the pleiades when it has dipped
verse_ar: وَٱلنَّجْمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ

verse_en: That your companion is not confused, nor has he gone astray,
verse_ar: مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمْ وَمَا غَوَىٰ

verse_en: Neither does he speak of his own will.
verse_ar: وَمَا يَنطِقُ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰٓ

verse_en: This is only revelation communicated,
verse_ar: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحْىٌۭ يُوحَىٰ

verse_en: Bestowed on him by the Supreme Intellect,
verse_ar: عَلَّمَهُۥ شَدِيدُ ٱلْقُوَىٰ

verse_en: Lord of power and wisdom. So he acquired poise and balance,
verse_ar: ذُو مِرَّةٍۢ فَٱسْتَوَىٰ

verse_en: And reached the highest pinnacle.
verse_ar: وَهُوَ بِٱلْأُفُقِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ

verse_en: Then he drew near and drew closer
verse_ar: ثُمَّ دَنَا فَتَدَلَّىٰ

verse_en: Until a space of two bow (arcs) or even less remained,
verse_ar: فَكَانَ قَابَ قَوْسَيْنِ أَوْ أَدْنَىٰ

verse_en: When He revealed to His votary what He revealed.
verse_ar: فَأَوْحَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ عَبْدِهِۦ مَآ أَوْحَىٰ

verse_en: His heart did not falsify what he perceived.
verse_ar: مَا كَذَبَ ٱلْفُؤَادُ مَا رَأَىٰٓ

verse_en: Will you dispute with him what he saw?
verse_ar: أَفَتُمَٰرُونَهُۥ عَلَىٰ مَا يَرَىٰ

verse_en: He saw Him indeed another time
verse_ar: وَلَقَدْ رَءَاهُ نَزْلَةً أُخْرَىٰ

verse_en: By the Lote-tree beyond which none can pass,
verse_ar: عِندَ سِدْرَةِ ٱلْمُنتَهَىٰ

verse_en: Close to which is the Garden of Tranquility,
verse_ar: عِندَهَا جَنَّةُ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰٓ

verse_en: When the Lote-tree was covered over with what it was covered over;
verse_ar: إِذْ يَغْشَى ٱلسِّدْرَةَ مَا يَغْشَىٰ

verse_en: Neither did sight falter nor exceed the bounds.
verse_ar: مَا زَاغَ ٱلْبَصَرُ وَمَا طَغَىٰ

verse_en: Indeed he saw some of the greatest signs of His Lord.
verse_ar: لَقَدْ رَأَىٰ مِنْ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ

verse_en: Have you considered Lat and 'Uzza,
verse_ar: أَفَرَءَيْتُمُ ٱللَّٰتَ وَٱلْعُزَّىٰ

verse_en: And Manat, the other third (of the pagan deities)?
verse_ar: وَمَنَوٰةَ ٱلثَّالِثَةَ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰٓ

verse_en: Are there sons for you, and daughters for Him?
verse_ar: أَلَكُمُ ٱلذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ ٱلْأُنثَىٰ

verse_en: This is certainly an unjust apportioning.
verse_ar: تِلْكَ إِذًۭا قِسْمَةٌۭ ضِيزَىٰٓ

verse_en: These are only names which you and your fathers have invented. No authority was sent down by God for them. They only follow conjecture and wish-fulfilment, even though guidance had come to them already from their Lord.
verse_ar: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّآ أَسْمَآءٌۭ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَآ أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُم مَّآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلْطَٰنٍ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهْوَى ٱلْأَنفُسُ ۖ وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّن رَّبِّهِمُ ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ

verse_en: Can ever man get what he desires?
verse_ar: أَمْ لِلْإِنسَٰنِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ

verse_en: To God belong the End and the Beginning.
verse_ar: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلْءَاخِرَةُ وَٱلْأُولَىٰ

verse_en: Many as the angels be in heaven their intercession will not avail in the least without God's permission for whomsoever He please and approve.
verse_ar: ۞ وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٍۢ فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ لَا تُغْنِى شَفَٰعَتُهُمْ شَيْـًٔا إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ أَن يَأْذَنَ ٱللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرْضَىٰٓ

verse_en: Those who do not believe in the Hereafter give the angels names of females.
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْءَاخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ تَسْمِيَةَ ٱلْأُنثَىٰ

verse_en: Yet they have no knowledge of this, and follow nothing but conjecture, but conjecture cannot replace the truth.
verse_ar: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ ۖ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱلْحَقِّ شَيْـًۭٔا

verse_en: So you turn away from him who turns away from Our rememberance and wants nothing but the life of this world:
verse_ar: فَأَعْرِضْ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكْرِنَا وَلَمْ يُرِدْ إِلَّا ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا

verse_en: This is the farthest limit of their knowledge. Surely your Lord alone knows best who has strayed away from the path and who has come to guidance.
verse_ar: ذَٰلِكَ مَبْلَغُهُم مِّنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱهْتَدَىٰ

verse_en: To God belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth, that He may requite those who do evil, in accordance with their deeds, and those who do good with good.
verse_ar: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ لِيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَٰٓـُٔوا۟ بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا۟ بِٱلْحُسْنَى

verse_en: As for those who avoid the greater sins and shameful acts, except minor trespasses, your Lord's forgiveness surely has great amplitude. He is fully knowledgeable of you as He produced you from the earth, and since you were a foetus in your mother's womb. So do not assert your goodness; he is better who takes heed and preserves himself.
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَٰٓئِرَ ٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْفَوَٰحِشَ إِلَّا ٱللَّمَمَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَٰسِعُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ ۚ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِكُمْ إِذْ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِذْ أَنتُمْ أَجِنَّةٌۭ فِى بُطُونِ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمْ ۖ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰٓ

verse_en: Have you seen him who turns his back,
verse_ar: أَفَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى تَوَلَّىٰ

verse_en: Who gives but little, and is niggardly?
verse_ar: وَأَعْطَىٰ قَلِيلًۭا وَأَكْدَىٰٓ

verse_en: Has he knowledge of the Unknown that he perceives everything?
verse_ar: أَعِندَهُۥ عِلْمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَهُوَ يَرَىٰٓ

verse_en: Has he not heard what is contained in the Book of Moses,
verse_ar: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِى صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ

verse_en: And of Abraham who fulfilled his trust? --
verse_ar: وَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلَّذِى وَفَّىٰٓ

verse_en: That no one who carries a burden bears another's load;
verse_ar: أَلَّا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌۭ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ

verse_en: That a man receives but only that for which he strives;
verse_ar: وَأَن لَّيْسَ لِلْإِنسَٰنِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ

verse_en: That his endeavours will be judged,
verse_ar: وَأَنَّ سَعْيَهُۥ سَوْفَ يُرَىٰ

verse_en: And only then will he receive his recompense in full;
verse_ar: ثُمَّ يُجْزَىٰهُ ٱلْجَزَآءَ ٱلْأَوْفَىٰ

verse_en: And that to your Lord is your returning;
verse_ar: وَأَنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلْمُنتَهَىٰ

verse_en: That it is He who makes you happy and morose,
verse_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَضْحَكَ وَأَبْكَىٰ

verse_en: And He who ordains death and life;
verse_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَمَاتَ وَأَحْيَا

verse_en: That He created pairs, male and female,
verse_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ خَلَقَ ٱلزَّوْجَيْنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰ

verse_en: From a drop of semen when emitted;
verse_ar: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ إِذَا تُمْنَىٰ

verse_en: That the second creation is incumbent on Him;
verse_ar: وَأَنَّ عَلَيْهِ ٱلنَّشْأَةَ ٱلْأُخْرَىٰ

verse_en: That it is He who makes you rich and contented;
verse_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَغْنَىٰ وَأَقْنَىٰ

verse_en: That He is the Lord of Sirius;
verse_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلشِّعْرَىٰ

verse_en: That it was He who destroyed the 'Ad of old,
verse_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥٓ أَهْلَكَ عَادًا ٱلْأُولَىٰ

verse_en: And Thamud, and did not leave them,
verse_ar: وَثَمُودَا۟ فَمَآ أَبْقَىٰ

verse_en: Like the people of Noah before them, who were surely oppressors and rebellious;
verse_ar: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍۢ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ هُمْ أَظْلَمَ وَأَطْغَىٰ

verse_en: And He overthrew the Cities of the Plain,
verse_ar: وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَةَ أَهْوَىٰ

verse_en: So that they were covered over by what they were covered over.
verse_ar: فَغَشَّىٰهَا مَا غَشَّىٰ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَىٰ

verse_en: He who warns you is one of the warners of old.
verse_ar: هَٰذَا نَذِيرٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلنُّذُرِ ٱلْأُولَىٰٓ

verse_en: What is to come is imminent.
verse_ar: أَزِفَتِ ٱلْءَازِفَةُ

verse_en: There is no one to unveil it apart from God.
verse_ar: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ

verse_en: Are you astonished at this news,
verse_ar: أَفَمِنْ هَٰذَا ٱلْحَدِيثِ تَعْجَبُونَ

verse_en: And keep laughing and do not weep,
verse_ar: وَتَضْحَكُونَ وَلَا تَبْكُونَ

verse_en: Indulging in pleasantries?
verse_ar: وَأَنتُمْ سَٰمِدُونَ

verse_en: Bow instead in adoration before God and worship Him.
verse_ar: فَٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِلَّهِ وَٱعْبُدُوا۟ ۩

verse_en: THE HOUR HAS come and split is the moon.
verse_ar: ٱقْتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلْقَمَرُ

verse_en: But if they see a sign they turn away, and say: "This is the same old lie continuing,"
verse_ar: وَإِن يَرَوْا۟ ءَايَةًۭ يُعْرِضُوا۟ وَيَقُولُوا۟ سِحْرٌۭ مُّسْتَمِرٌّۭ

verse_en: And deny, and follow their own vain desires; but every matter is determined at its time.
verse_ar: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍۢ مُّسْتَقِرٌّۭ

verse_en: Messages deterring them from evil had come to them,
verse_ar: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ

verse_en: Containing consummate wisdom; yet warnings were of no avail.
verse_ar: حِكْمَةٌۢ بَٰلِغَةٌۭ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ

verse_en: So turn away from them. When on the Day the crier calls to the painful business,
verse_ar: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَىْءٍۢ نُّكُرٍ

verse_en: They will come out of the graves with downcast eyes like an expanding swarm of locusts.
verse_ar: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَٰرُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌۭ مُّنتَشِرٌۭ

verse_en: They will hasten forward to the caller, gazes fixed. And the unbelievers will say: "This is the day of untold woe."
verse_ar: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌۭ

verse_en: The people of Noah had denied before them, and had called Our votary a liar, and said: "He is possessed," and repulsed him.
verse_ar: ۞ كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍۢ فَكَذَّبُوا۟ عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا۟ مَجْنُونٌۭ وَٱزْدُجِرَ

verse_en: So he prayed to his Lord: "I am helpless, deliver me."
verse_ar: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَغْلُوبٌۭ فَٱنتَصِرْ

verse_en: And We opened up the flood gates of the sky with water pouring down in torrents,
verse_ar: فَفَتَحْنَآ أَبْوَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَآءٍۢ مُّنْهَمِرٍۢ

verse_en: And We opened up the springs of the earth; and the waters met for a decreed end.
verse_ar: وَفَجَّرْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ عُيُونًۭا فَٱلْتَقَى ٱلْمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمْرٍۢ قَدْ قُدِرَ

verse_en: But We bore him on a (vessel made) of planks and oakum,
verse_ar: وَحَمَلْنَٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَٰحٍۢ وَدُسُرٍۢ

verse_en: Which sailed right under Our eyes: A recompense for him who had been denied.
verse_ar: تَجْرِى بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَآءًۭ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ

verse_en: And We left it as a sign. Is there anyone who will be warned?
verse_ar: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَٰهَآ ءَايَةًۭ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍۢ

verse_en: How was then My punishment and My commination!
verse_ar: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

verse_en: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will be warned?
verse_ar: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍۢ

verse_en: The 'Ad had also disavowed. How was then My punishment and My commination!
verse_ar: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌۭ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

verse_en: We let loose against them a violent roaring wind on a day of ill omen, continuous,
verse_ar: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًۭا صَرْصَرًۭا فِى يَوْمِ نَحْسٍۢ مُّسْتَمِرٍّۢ

verse_en: Which snatched away men as though they were palm trees pulled out by the roots.
verse_ar: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍۢ مُّنقَعِرٍۢ

verse_en: How was then My punishment and My commination!
verse_ar: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

verse_en: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will pay heed?
verse_ar: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍۢ

verse_en: The Thamud rejected the warnings,
verse_ar: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ

verse_en: And said: "Should we follow only one man among us? In that case we shall he in error and insane.
verse_ar: فَقَالُوٓا۟ أَبَشَرًۭا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدًۭا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذًۭا لَّفِى ضَلَٰلٍۢ وَسُعُرٍ

verse_en: Was he the one of all of us to have been given the exposition? He is surely an impudent liar."
verse_ar: أَءُلْقِىَ ٱلذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌۭ

verse_en: "Tomorrow they will know who is the impudent liar!
verse_ar: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًۭا مَّنِ ٱلْكَذَّابُ ٱلْأَشِرُ

verse_en: We shall send the she-camel to try them. So watch them, and be constant.
verse_ar: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُوا۟ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةًۭ لَّهُمْ فَٱرْتَقِبْهُمْ وَٱصْطَبِرْ

verse_en: Tell them that the water is to be apportioned between them (and her); and every turn of drinking will be fixed (for each)."
verse_ar: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ ٱلْمَآءَ قِسْمَةٌۢ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍۢ مُّحْتَضَرٌۭ

verse_en: But they called their commander, who seized and hamstrung her.
verse_ar: فَنَادَوْا۟ صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ

verse_en: How was then My punishment of which they had been warned?
verse_ar: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

verse_en: We sent a single blast against them, and they were reduced to husks of a decayed fence.
verse_ar: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ فَكَانُوا۟ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلْمُحْتَظِرِ

verse_en: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will be warned?
verse_ar: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍۢ

verse_en: The people of Lot rejected the warnings.
verse_ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ

verse_en: We sent a stone-hurtling storm against them, except the family of Lot whom We saved in the early hours of the morning
verse_ar: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍۢ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَٰهُم بِسَحَرٍۢ

verse_en: As a favour from Us. That is how We reward the grateful.
verse_ar: نِّعْمَةًۭ مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى مَن شَكَرَ

verse_en: He had warned them of Our might, but they passed over the warnings.
verse_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا۟ بِٱلنُّذُرِ

verse_en: They lusted after his guests, so We put out their eyes (and said): "Taste My punishment and My commination."
verse_ar: وَلَقَدْ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِۦ فَطَمَسْنَآ أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

verse_en: And early in the morning the decreed punishment came upon them.
verse_ar: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌۭ مُّسْتَقِرٌّۭ

verse_en: So now taste My punishment and My commination!
verse_ar: فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِى وَنُذُرِ

verse_en: Easy have We made the Qur'an to understand: So is there any one who will be warned?
verse_ar: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا ٱلْقُرْءَانَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍۢ

verse_en: The warnings came to the people of Pharaoh.
verse_ar: وَلَقَدْ جَآءَ ءَالَ فِرْعَوْنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ

verse_en: They rejected each one of Our signs. So We seized them with the grip of one mighty and powerful.
verse_ar: كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَٰهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍۢ مُّقْتَدِرٍ

verse_en: Are the unbelievers among you any better than they? Or is there immunity for you in the Scriptures?
verse_ar: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌۭ مِّنْ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٌۭ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ

verse_en: Or do they say: "We are a well-accoutred army?"
verse_ar: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌۭ مُّنتَصِرٌۭ

verse_en: The army will be routed and put to flight.
verse_ar: سَيُهْزَمُ ٱلْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ

verse_en: Surely the Hour will be the moment of their promise, and that moment will be calamitous and distressing.
verse_ar: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ

verse_en: Surely the sinners are misguided and insane.
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ فِى ضَلَٰلٍۢ وَسُعُرٍۢ

verse_en: On that Day they will be dragged into the fire faces foremost, (and told:) "Taste the feel of Hell."
verse_ar: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِى ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا۟ مَسَّ سَقَرَ

verse_en: We have indeed created all things by measure;
verse_ar: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَٰهُ بِقَدَرٍۢ

verse_en: And Our command is but one (word) swift as the winking of an eye.
verse_ar: وَمَآ أَمْرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٌۭ كَلَمْحٍۭ بِٱلْبَصَرِ

verse_en: We have destroyed the likes of you in the past: So is there any one who will be warned?
verse_ar: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَآ أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍۢ

verse_en: All things they do are (recorded) in the books;
verse_ar: وَكُلُّ شَىْءٍۢ فَعَلُوهُ فِى ٱلزُّبُرِ

verse_en: All things small or great have been written down.
verse_ar: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍۢ وَكَبِيرٍۢ مُّسْتَطَرٌ

verse_en: Surely those who fear God and follow the straight path will be amidst gardens and light,
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَنَهَرٍۢ

verse_en: At the still centre in the proximity of the King all-powerful.
verse_ar: فِى مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍۢ مُّقْتَدِرٍۭ

verse_en: AR-RAHMAN
verse_ar: ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ

verse_en: Bestowed the Qur'an,
verse_ar: عَلَّمَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ

verse_en: Created man,
verse_ar: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ

verse_en: And taught him to express clearly.
verse_ar: عَلَّمَهُ ٱلْبَيَانَ

verse_en: The sun and moon revolve to a computation;
verse_ar: ٱلشَّمْسُ وَٱلْقَمَرُ بِحُسْبَانٍۢ

verse_en: And the grasses and the trees bow (to Him) in adoration.
verse_ar: وَٱلنَّجْمُ وَٱلشَّجَرُ يَسْجُدَانِ

verse_en: He raised the sky and set the Balance
verse_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ رَفَعَهَا وَوَضَعَ ٱلْمِيزَانَ

verse_en: So that none may err against the scales,
verse_ar: أَلَّا تَطْغَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْمِيزَانِ

verse_en: And observe correct measure, weigh with justice, and not cheat the balance.
verse_ar: وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلْوَزْنَ بِٱلْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا۟ ٱلْمِيزَانَ

verse_en: He positioned the earth for all the creatures:
verse_ar: وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلْأَنَامِ

verse_en: There are fruits of all kinds on it, and date-palms with their clusters sheathed,
verse_ar: فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٌۭ وَٱلنَّخْلُ ذَاتُ ٱلْأَكْمَامِ

verse_en: Grain with husk, and fragrant grasses.
verse_ar: وَٱلْحَبُّ ذُو ٱلْعَصْفِ وَٱلرَّيْحَانُ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: He created man of fermented clay dried tinkling hard like earthen ware,
verse_ar: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلْصَٰلٍۢ كَٱلْفَخَّارِ

verse_en: And created jinns from the white-hot flame of fire.
verse_ar: وَخَلَقَ ٱلْجَآنَّ مِن مَّارِجٍۢ مِّن نَّارٍۢ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: Lord of the two Easts, Lord of the two Wests.
verse_ar: رَبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقَيْنِ وَرَبُّ ٱلْمَغْرِبَيْنِ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: He has set two seas in motion that flow side by side together,
verse_ar: مَرَجَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ يَلْتَقِيَانِ

verse_en: With an interstice between them which they cannot cross.
verse_ar: بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخٌۭ لَّا يَبْغِيَانِ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: Out of them come pearls and coral.
verse_ar: يَخْرُجُ مِنْهُمَا ٱللُّؤْلُؤُ وَٱلْمَرْجَانُ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: His are the high-sailed vessels in deep ocean like the mountains.
verse_ar: وَلَهُ ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ كَٱلْأَعْلَٰمِ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: All that is on the earth is passing,
verse_ar: كُلُّ مَنْ عَلَيْهَا فَانٍۢ

verse_en: But abiding is the glory of your Lord, full of majesty and beneficence.
verse_ar: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلْجَلَٰلِ وَٱلْإِكْرَامِ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: All those there are in the heavens and the earth turn to Him with solicitation, intent on His purpose all the time.
verse_ar: يَسْـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِى شَأْنٍۢ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: We shall soon be free to turn to you, O weary caravans,
verse_ar: سَنَفْرُغُ لَكُمْ أَيُّهَ ٱلثَّقَلَانِ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: O society of jinns and men, cross the bounds of the heavens and the earth if you have the ability, then pass beyond them; but you cannot unless you acquire the law.
verse_ar: يَٰمَعْشَرَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ إِنِ ٱسْتَطَعْتُمْ أَن تَنفُذُوا۟ مِنْ أَقْطَارِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنفُذُوا۟ ۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلْطَٰنٍۢ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: Let loose at you will be smokeless flames of fire so that you will not be able to defend yourselves.
verse_ar: يُرْسَلُ عَلَيْكُمَا شُوَاظٌۭ مِّن نَّارٍۢ وَنُحَاسٌۭ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: When the sky will split asunder, and turn rosy like the dregs of annointing oil,
verse_ar: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ وَرْدَةًۭ كَٱلدِّهَانِ

verse_en: Which of the favours of your Lord will you then deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: Neither man nor jinn will be questioned on that day about his sin.
verse_ar: فَيَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّا يُسْـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٌۭ وَلَا جَآنٌّۭ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will you then deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: The sinners will be recognised by their marks, and seized by the forelock and their feet.
verse_ar: يُعْرَفُ ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ بِسِيمَٰهُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِى وَٱلْأَقْدَامِ

verse_en: Which of the favours of your Lord will you then deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: This is Hell the sinners called a lie.
verse_ar: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ

verse_en: They will go round and around between it and boiling water.
verse_ar: يَطُوفُونَ بَيْنَهَا وَبَيْنَ حَمِيمٍ ءَانٍۢ

verse_en: Which of the favours of your Lord will you then deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: But for him who lived in awe of the sublimity of his Lord, there will be two gardens --
verse_ar: وَلِمَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ جَنَّتَانِ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: Full of overhanging branches --
verse_ar: ذَوَاتَآ أَفْنَانٍۢ

verse_en: Which of the favours of your Lord will you then deny? --
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: With two springs of water flowing through them both. --
verse_ar: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ تَجْرِيَانِ

verse_en: Which of the favours of your Lord will then both of you deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: In both of them there will be every kind of fruits in pairs. --
verse_ar: فِيهِمَا مِن كُلِّ فَٰكِهَةٍۢ زَوْجَانِ

verse_en: Which of the favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: Reclining there on carpets lined with brocade, fruits of the garden hanging low within reach.
verse_ar: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشٍۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَبْرَقٍۢ ۚ وَجَنَى ٱلْجَنَّتَيْنِ دَانٍۢ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: In them maidens with averted glances, undeflowered by man or by jinn before them, --
verse_ar: فِيهِنَّ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌۭ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَآنٌّۭ

verse_en: Which of the favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: As though rubies and pearls.
verse_ar: كَأَنَّهُنَّ ٱلْيَاقُوتُ وَٱلْمَرْجَانُ

verse_en: Which of the favours of your Lord will then both of you deny?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: Should the reward of goodness be aught else but goodness? --
verse_ar: هَلْ جَزَآءُ ٱلْإِحْسَٰنِ إِلَّا ٱلْإِحْسَٰنُ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: And besides these two other gardens --
verse_ar: وَمِن دُونِهِمَا جَنَّتَانِ

verse_en: Which of the favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: Of darkest verdant green --
verse_ar: مُدْهَآمَّتَانِ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

verse_en: With two fountains gushing constantly, --
verse_ar: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ نَضَّاخَتَانِ

verse_en: How many favours of your Lord will then both of you deny? --
