verse_en: They will say: "If we had listened and been wise, we would not have been among the inmates of Hell."
verse_ar: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْ كُنَّا نَسْمَعُ أَوْ نَعْقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِىٓ أَصْحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

verse_en: So will they confess their guilt. Deprived (of all joys) will be the inmates of Hell.
verse_ar: فَٱعْتَرَفُوا۟ بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسُحْقًۭا لِّأَصْحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

verse_en: For those who fear their Lord in secret is forgiveness and a great reward.
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَيْبِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌۭ وَأَجْرٌۭ كَبِيرٌۭ

verse_en: Whether you say a thing secretly or openly, He knows the innermost secrets of your hearts.
verse_ar: وَأَسِرُّوا۟ قَوْلَكُمْ أَوِ ٱجْهَرُوا۟ بِهِۦٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

verse_en: Can He who has created not know (His creation)? He is all-penetrating, all-aware.
verse_ar: أَلَا يَعْلَمُ مَنْ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ

verse_en: It is He who made the earth subservient to you that you may travel all around it, and eat of things He has provided; and to Him will be your resurrection.
verse_ar: هُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ ذَلُولًۭا فَٱمْشُوا۟ فِى مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُوا۟ مِن رِّزْقِهِۦ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ

verse_en: Are you so unafraid that He who is in Heaven will not open up the earth to swallow you, when it will begin to tremble?
verse_ar: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخْسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَمُورُ

verse_en: Or have you become so unafraid that He who is in Heaven will not send a violent wind to shower stones at you? Then you will know the import of My commination!
verse_ar: أَمْ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرْسِلَ عَلَيْكُمْ حَاصِبًۭا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ كَيْفَ نَذِيرِ

verse_en: Those before them had also denied. And how was My punishment then!
verse_ar: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

verse_en: Do they not see the birds above them flying wings spread out or folded? Nothing holds them aloft but God. All things are within His purview.
verse_ar: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَٰٓفَّٰتٍۢ وَيَقْبِضْنَ ۚ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍۭ بَصِيرٌ

verse_en: What other army do you have to help you apart from Ar-Rahman? The unbelievers are surely lost in delusion.
verse_ar: أَمَّنْ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى هُوَ جُندٌۭ لَّكُمْ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ۚ إِنِ ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِى غُرُورٍ

verse_en: Who is there to give you food in case He withholds His bounty? Yet they persist in rebellion and aversion.
verse_ar: أَمَّنْ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَرْزُقُكُمْ إِنْ أَمْسَكَ رِزْقَهُۥ ۚ بَل لَّجُّوا۟ فِى عُتُوٍّۢ وَنُفُورٍ

verse_en: Will he find the way who grovels flat on his face, or he who walks straight on the right path?
verse_ar: أَفَمَن يَمْشِى مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦٓ أَهْدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمْشِى سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ

verse_en: Say: "It is He who raised you and gave you ears and eyes and hearts. How little are the thanks you offer!"
verse_ar: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَكُمْ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۖ قَلِيلًۭا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ

verse_en: Say: "It is He who dispersed you all over the earth, and to Him you will be gathered."
verse_ar: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ

verse_en: But they say: "When will this promise come to pass, if what you say is true?"
verse_ar: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰدِقِينَ

verse_en: Say: "God alone has knowledge. My duty is only to warn you clearly."
verse_ar: قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْعِلْمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ

verse_en: When they realise it has come upon them, distraught will be the faces of unbelievers. They will be told: "This is what you asked for."
verse_ar: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ زُلْفَةًۭ سِيٓـَٔتْ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَقِيلَ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ

verse_en: Say: "Just think: If God destroys me and those with me, or is benevolent to us, who will then protect the unbelievers from a painful doom?"
verse_ar: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَهْلَكَنِىَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِىَ أَوْ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍۢ

verse_en: Say: "He is the benevolent; in Him do we believe, and in Him do we place our trust. You will now realise who is in manifest error."
verse_ar: قُلْ هُوَ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا ۖ فَسَتَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ فِى ضَلَٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ

verse_en: Say: "Just think: If your water were to dry up in the morning who will bring you water from a fresh, flowing stream?"
verse_ar: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِنْ أَصْبَحَ مَآؤُكُمْ غَوْرًۭا فَمَن يَأْتِيكُم بِمَآءٍۢ مَّعِينٍۭ

verse_en: NUN. I CALL to witness the pen and what they inscribe,
verse_ar: نٓ ۚ وَٱلْقَلَمِ وَمَا يَسْطُرُونَ

verse_en: You are not demented by the grace of your Lord.
verse_ar: مَآ أَنتَ بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ بِمَجْنُونٍۢ

verse_en: There is surely reward unending for you,
verse_ar: وَإِنَّ لَكَ لَأَجْرًا غَيْرَ مَمْنُونٍۢ

verse_en: For you are verily born of sublime nature.
verse_ar: وَإِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ خُلُقٍ عَظِيمٍۢ

verse_en: So you will see, and they will realise,
verse_ar: فَسَتُبْصِرُ وَيُبْصِرُونَ

verse_en: Who is distracted.
verse_ar: بِأَييِّكُمُ ٱلْمَفْتُونُ

verse_en: Verily your Lord knows those who have gone astray from His path, and He knows those who are guided on the way.
verse_ar: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ

verse_en: So do not comply with those who deny:
verse_ar: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verse_en: They only want that you should relent, so that they may come to terms.
verse_ar: وَدُّوا۟ لَوْ تُدْهِنُ فَيُدْهِنُونَ

verse_en: Do not heed a contemptible swearer,
verse_ar: وَلَا تُطِعْ كُلَّ حَلَّافٍۢ مَّهِينٍ

verse_en: Or backbiter, calumniator, slanderer,
verse_ar: هَمَّازٍۢ مَّشَّآءٍۭ بِنَمِيمٍۢ

verse_en: Who hinders men from (doing) good, the transgressor, the iniquitous,
verse_ar: مَّنَّاعٍۢ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

verse_en: Crude, and above all, mean and infamous,
verse_ar: عُتُلٍّۭ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ زَنِيمٍ

verse_en: Simply because he possesses wealth and children.
verse_ar: أَن كَانَ ذَا مَالٍۢ وَبَنِينَ

verse_en: When you recite Our revelations to him, he says: "These are fables of long ago."
verse_ar: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

verse_en: We shall brand him on the muzzle.
verse_ar: سَنَسِمُهُۥ عَلَى ٱلْخُرْطُومِ

verse_en: We have tried you as We tried the owners of the garden when they vowed to gather the fruits in the morning
verse_ar: إِنَّا بَلَوْنَٰهُمْ كَمَا بَلَوْنَآ أَصْحَٰبَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ إِذْ أَقْسَمُوا۟ لَيَصْرِمُنَّهَا مُصْبِحِينَ

verse_en: But did not add: "If God may please."
verse_ar: وَلَا يَسْتَثْنُونَ

verse_en: Then a calamity from your Lord fell upon it, but they remained fast asleep.
verse_ar: فَطَافَ عَلَيْهَا طَآئِفٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمْ نَآئِمُونَ

verse_en: So by the morning it seemed as though picked clean.
verse_ar: فَأَصْبَحَتْ كَٱلصَّرِيمِ

verse_en: At daybreak they called to each other:
verse_ar: فَتَنَادَوْا۟ مُصْبِحِينَ

verse_en: "If you want to gather the fruits, let us go early to the plantation."
verse_ar: أَنِ ٱغْدُوا۟ عَلَىٰ حَرْثِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَٰرِمِينَ

verse_en: So they departed, talking in low voices:
verse_ar: فَٱنطَلَقُوا۟ وَهُمْ يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ

verse_en: "Let no needy person come to you within it today."
verse_ar: أَن لَّا يَدْخُلَنَّهَا ٱلْيَوْمَ عَلَيْكُم مِّسْكِينٌۭ

verse_en: They left early in the morning bent on this purpose.
verse_ar: وَغَدَوْا۟ عَلَىٰ حَرْدٍۢ قَٰدِرِينَ

verse_en: When they saw (and did not recognise it) they said: "Surely we have lost the way.
verse_ar: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهَا قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا لَضَآلُّونَ

verse_en: No. In fact we have been deprived of it."
verse_ar: بَلْ نَحْنُ مَحْرُومُونَ

verse_en: One who was temperate among them, said: "Did I not say: 'Why don't you priase God?'"
verse_ar: قَالَ أَوْسَطُهُمْ أَلَمْ أَقُل لَّكُمْ لَوْلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ

verse_en: "Glory to our Lord," they said; we were really in the wrong."
verse_ar: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

verse_en: Then they started blaming one another,
verse_ar: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍۢ يَتَلَٰوَمُونَ

verse_en: Saying: "Alas the woe, we were iniquitous.
verse_ar: قَالُوا۟ يَٰوَيْلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا طَٰغِينَ

verse_en: Maybe our Lord will give us better than this. We turn to our Lord in supplication."
verse_ar: عَسَىٰ رَبُّنَآ أَن يُبْدِلَنَا خَيْرًۭا مِّنْهَآ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا رَٰغِبُونَ

verse_en: Such is Our chastisement; and the punishment of the Hereafter will be greater, if only they knew!
verse_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلْعَذَابُ ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ

verse_en: For those who fear God there are pleasure gardens with their Lord.
verse_ar: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

verse_en: Should We treat those who submit and obey in the same way as those who are culpable?
verse_ar: أَفَنَجْعَلُ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ كَٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ

verse_en: What has come upon you that you judge in such a wise?
verse_ar: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ

verse_en: Or have you a Book in which you read
verse_ar: أَمْ لَكُمْ كِتَٰبٌۭ فِيهِ تَدْرُسُونَ

verse_en: That you can surely have whatever you choose?
verse_ar: إِنَّ لَكُمْ فِيهِ لَمَا تَخَيَّرُونَ

verse_en: Or have you taken a binding promise from Us which would hold till the Day of Judgement, that you will get whatever you demand?
verse_ar: أَمْ لَكُمْ أَيْمَٰنٌ عَلَيْنَا بَٰلِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ ۙ إِنَّ لَكُمْ لَمَا تَحْكُمُونَ

verse_en: Ask them: "Which of you is able to vouch for this?"
verse_ar: سَلْهُمْ أَيُّهُم بِذَٰلِكَ زَعِيمٌ

verse_en: Or have they any partners? Let them bring their partners then, if what they say is true.
verse_ar: أَمْ لَهُمْ شُرَكَآءُ فَلْيَأْتُوا۟ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمْ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَٰدِقِينَ

verse_en: On the day the great calamity befalls, and they are called to bow in homage, they will not be able to do so.
verse_ar: يَوْمَ يُكْشَفُ عَن سَاقٍۢ وَيُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ

verse_en: Lowered will be their eyes, disgrace overwhelming them. They had indeed been called to bow in homage when they were free of blame.
verse_ar: خَٰشِعَةً أَبْصَٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌۭ ۖ وَقَدْ كَانُوا۟ يُدْعَوْنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمْ سَٰلِمُونَ

verse_en: So leave those who deny this Discourse to Me. We shall lead them step by step to (ruin) in a way they will not know.
verse_ar: فَذَرْنِى وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلْحَدِيثِ ۖ سَنَسْتَدْرِجُهُم مِّنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

verse_en: Yet I will give them respite: Surely My plan is compact.
verse_ar: وَأُمْلِى لَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّ كَيْدِى مَتِينٌ

verse_en: Do you ask for any compensation from them that they are burdened with want?
verse_ar: أَمْ تَسْـَٔلُهُمْ أَجْرًۭا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍۢ مُّثْقَلُونَ

verse_en: Or do they have knowledge of the unknown which they copy down?
verse_ar: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ ٱلْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ

verse_en: So wait with patience for the judgement of your Lord, and do not be like (onah) of the fish who called (to his Lord) when he was choked with anger.
verse_ar: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلْحُوتِ إِذْ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكْظُومٌۭ

verse_en: Had it not been for a favour from his Lord he would have been cast blame-worthy on a barren plain.
verse_ar: لَّوْلَآ أَن تَدَٰرَكَهُۥ نِعْمَةٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ لَنُبِذَ بِٱلْعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ مَذْمُومٌۭ

verse_en: Then his Lord chose him and placed him among the upright.
verse_ar: فَٱجْتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَجَعَلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

verse_en: But the unbelievers would like to stare you out of balance when they hear the warning, and say: "Surely he is possessed;"
verse_ar: وَإِن يَكَادُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَيُزْلِقُونَكَ بِأَبْصَٰرِهِمْ لَمَّا سَمِعُوا۟ ٱلذِّكْرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُۥ لَمَجْنُونٌۭ

verse_en: Whilst it is no more than reminder for the people of the world.
verse_ar: وَمَا هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌۭ لِّلْعَٰلَمِينَ

verse_en: THE CONCRETE REALITY.
verse_ar: ٱلْحَآقَّةُ

verse_en: What is the concrete reality?
verse_ar: مَا ٱلْحَآقَّةُ

verse_en: What do you comprehend by the concrete reality?
verse_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْحَآقَّةُ

verse_en: The Thamud and 'Ad denied the consequential calamity.
verse_ar: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ وَعَادٌۢ بِٱلْقَارِعَةِ

verse_en: So destroyed were the Thamud by a storm of thunder and lightning;
verse_ar: فَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ بِٱلطَّاغِيَةِ

verse_en: And the 'Ad were destroyed by the furious cold blast of roaring wind
verse_ar: وَأَمَّا عَادٌۭ فَأُهْلِكُوا۟ بِرِيحٍۢ صَرْصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍۢ

verse_en: Which He sent to assail them for seven nights and eight days running. You should have seen the people prostrate like the decayed trunks of date-palm trees.
verse_ar: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَبْعَ لَيَالٍۢ وَثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومًۭا فَتَرَى ٱلْقَوْمَ فِيهَا صَرْعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ خَاوِيَةٍۢ

verse_en: Do you see any trace of them?
verse_ar: فَهَلْ تَرَىٰ لَهُم مِّنۢ بَاقِيَةٍۢ

verse_en: Then came the Pharaoh, and those before him whose habitations were overthrown while they were committing crimes.
verse_ar: وَجَآءَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَن قَبْلَهُۥ وَٱلْمُؤْتَفِكَٰتُ بِٱلْخَاطِئَةِ

verse_en: When they disobeyed the apostle of their Lord He seized them with an overwhelming punishment.
verse_ar: فَعَصَوْا۟ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَهُمْ أَخْذَةًۭ رَّابِيَةً

verse_en: When the water rose in flood, We bore you in the ark,
verse_ar: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلْمَآءُ حَمَلْنَٰكُمْ فِى ٱلْجَارِيَةِ

verse_en: In order to make it a warning for you, and that the ear retentive may preserve it.
verse_ar: لِنَجْعَلَهَا لَكُمْ تَذْكِرَةًۭ وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٌۭ وَٰعِيَةٌۭ

verse_en: When the single blast is sounded on the trumpet,
verse_ar: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى ٱلصُّورِ نَفْخَةٌۭ وَٰحِدَةٌۭ

verse_en: And the earth and mountains heaved and crushed to powder with one levelling blow,
verse_ar: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ

verse_en: On that Day will come what is to come.
verse_ar: فَيَوْمَئِذٍۢ وَقَعَتِ ٱلْوَاقِعَةُ

verse_en: The sky will cleave asunder on that day and fall to pieces.
verse_ar: وَٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَهِىَ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ وَاهِيَةٌۭ

verse_en: On its fringes will be angels, eight of them, bearing their Lord's throne aloft.
verse_ar: وَٱلْمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرْجَآئِهَا ۚ وَيَحْمِلُ عَرْشَ رَبِّكَ فَوْقَهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ ثَمَٰنِيَةٌۭ

verse_en: You will then be set before Him, and not one of you will remain unexposed.
verse_ar: يَوْمَئِذٍۢ تُعْرَضُونَ لَا تَخْفَىٰ مِنكُمْ خَافِيَةٌۭ

verse_en: He who is given his ledger in his right hand, will say: "Here, read my ledger.
verse_ar: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقْرَءُوا۟ كِتَٰبِيَهْ

verse_en: I was certain I'll be given my account."
verse_ar: إِنِّى ظَنَنتُ أَنِّى مُلَٰقٍ حِسَابِيَهْ

verse_en: So he shall have an agreeable life
verse_ar: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَةٍۢ رَّاضِيَةٍۢ

verse_en: In high empyrean
verse_ar: فِى جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍۢ

verse_en: With fruits hanging low within reach,
verse_ar: قُطُوفُهَا دَانِيَةٌۭ

verse_en: (And told:) "Eat and drink to your fill as reward for (good) deeds you had done in days of yore."
verse_ar: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَآ أَسْلَفْتُمْ فِى ٱلْأَيَّامِ ٱلْخَالِيَةِ

verse_en: But whosoever gets his ledger in his left hand, will say: "Would that I were never given my ledger,
verse_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ يَٰلَيْتَنِى لَمْ أُوتَ كِتَٰبِيَهْ

verse_en: And not known my account!
verse_ar: وَلَمْ أَدْرِ مَا حِسَابِيَهْ

verse_en: I wish death had put an end to me.
verse_ar: يَٰلَيْتَهَا كَانَتِ ٱلْقَاضِيَةَ

verse_en: Of no use was even my wealth.
verse_ar: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنِّى مَالِيَهْ ۜ

verse_en: Vanished has my power from me."
verse_ar: هَلَكَ عَنِّى سُلْطَٰنِيَهْ

verse_en: "Seize him and manacle him,
verse_ar: خُذُوهُ فَغُلُّوهُ

verse_en: Then cast him to be burnt in Hell;
verse_ar: ثُمَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ صَلُّوهُ

verse_en: And string him to a chain seventy cubits long.
verse_ar: ثُمَّ فِى سِلْسِلَةٍۢ ذَرْعُهَا سَبْعُونَ ذِرَاعًۭا فَٱسْلُكُوهُ

verse_en: He did not believe in God the supreme,
verse_ar: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤْمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

verse_en: Nor urged others to feed the poor.
verse_ar: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ

verse_en: That is why he has no friend today,
verse_ar: فَلَيْسَ لَهُ ٱلْيَوْمَ هَٰهُنَا حَمِيمٌۭ

verse_en: Nor food other than suppuration (filth)
verse_ar: وَلَا طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنْ غِسْلِينٍۢ

verse_en: Which none but the hellish eat."
verse_ar: لَّا يَأْكُلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلْخَٰطِـُٔونَ

verse_en: So, I call to witness what you see
verse_ar: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِمَا تُبْصِرُونَ

verse_en: And what you do not see,
verse_ar: وَمَا لَا تُبْصِرُونَ

verse_en: That this is indeed the word of the noble Messenger,
verse_ar: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍۢ كَرِيمٍۢ

verse_en: And not the word of a poet. How little is it that you believe!
verse_ar: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَاعِرٍۢ ۚ قَلِيلًۭا مَّا تُؤْمِنُونَ

verse_en: Nor is it the word of a soothsayer. Little is it that you reflect!
verse_ar: وَلَا بِقَوْلِ كَاهِنٍۢ ۚ قَلِيلًۭا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

verse_en: It has been sent down by the Lord of all the worlds.
verse_ar: تَنزِيلٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ

verse_en: Had he attributed falsely any words to Us,
verse_ar: وَلَوْ تَقَوَّلَ عَلَيْنَا بَعْضَ ٱلْأَقَاوِيلِ

verse_en: We would have seized him by his right hand,
verse_ar: لَأَخَذْنَا مِنْهُ بِٱلْيَمِينِ

verse_en: Then cut off his aorta,
verse_ar: ثُمَّ لَقَطَعْنَا مِنْهُ ٱلْوَتِينَ

verse_en: And not one of you would have been able to stop (Us).
verse_ar: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ عَنْهُ حَٰجِزِينَ

verse_en: It is really a reminder for those who fear God and follow the straight path.
verse_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَتَذْكِرَةٌۭ لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ

verse_en: We certainly know that some among you do deny it.
verse_ar: وَإِنَّا لَنَعْلَمُ أَنَّ مِنكُم مُّكَذِّبِينَ

verse_en: It is surely the nemesis of unbelievers.
verse_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَسْرَةٌ عَلَى ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ

verse_en: And He, He is indeed the ultimate Reality.
verse_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَقُّ ٱلْيَقِينِ

verse_en: So glorify your Lord, the most supreme.
verse_ar: فَسَبِّحْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

verse_en: AN INQUIRER ASKED for the affliction that is to come
verse_ar: سَأَلَ سَآئِلٌۢ بِعَذَابٍۢ وَاقِعٍۢ

verse_en: Upon the infidels -- which none would be able to repel --
verse_ar: لِّلْكَٰفِرِينَ لَيْسَ لَهُۥ دَافِعٌۭ

verse_en: From God, the Lord of the steps (of progression),
verse_ar: مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ذِى ٱلْمَعَارِجِ

verse_en: To whom the angels and the soul take a day to ascend, whose length is fifty thousand years.
verse_ar: تَعْرُجُ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيْهِ فِى يَوْمٍۢ كَانَ مِقْدَارُهُۥ خَمْسِينَ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍۢ

verse_en: So persevere with becoming patience.
verse_ar: فَٱصْبِرْ صَبْرًۭا جَمِيلًا

verse_en: They surely take it to be far away,
verse_ar: إِنَّهُمْ يَرَوْنَهُۥ بَعِيدًۭا

verse_en: But We see it very near.
verse_ar: وَنَرَىٰهُ قَرِيبًۭا

verse_en: The day the sky becomes like molten brass,
verse_ar: يَوْمَ تَكُونُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ كَٱلْمُهْلِ

verse_en: The mountains like the tufts of (carded) wool,
verse_ar: وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ

verse_en: And no friend inquires after friend
verse_ar: وَلَا يَسْـَٔلُ حَمِيمٌ حَمِيمًۭا

verse_en: Though within sight of one another. The sinner would like to ransom himself from the torment of that Day by offering his sons,
verse_ar: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمْ ۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلْمُجْرِمُ لَوْ يَفْتَدِى مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمِئِذٍۭ بِبَنِيهِ

verse_en: His wife and his brother,
verse_ar: وَصَٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَأَخِيهِ

verse_en: And his family who had stood by him,
verse_ar: وَفَصِيلَتِهِ ٱلَّتِى تُـْٔوِيهِ

verse_en: And all those who are on the earth, to save himself.
verse_ar: وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًۭا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ

verse_en: But never. It is pure white flame
verse_ar: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّهَا لَظَىٰ

verse_en: That would skin the scalp.
verse_ar: نَزَّاعَةًۭ لِّلشَّوَىٰ

verse_en: It will summon whoever turns his back and flees,
verse_ar: تَدْعُوا۟ مَنْ أَدْبَرَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

verse_en: Who amasses and then hoards.
verse_ar: وَجَمَعَ فَأَوْعَىٰٓ

verse_en: Surely man is greedy by nature.
verse_ar: ۞ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا

verse_en: If evil befalls him he is perturbed;
verse_ar: إِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ جَزُوعًۭا

verse_en: If good comes to him he holds back his hand,
verse_ar: وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلْخَيْرُ مَنُوعًا

verse_en: Except those who closely follow (the Book of God),
verse_ar: إِلَّا ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ

verse_en: Who persevere in devotion,
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ دَآئِمُونَ

verse_en: In whose wealth a due share is included
verse_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ فِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّۭ مَّعْلُومٌۭ

verse_en: For the needy and those dispossessed,
verse_ar: لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ

verse_en: And those who believe in the Day of Judgement,
verse_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُصَدِّقُونَ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ

verse_en: And those who fear the punishment of their Lord, --
verse_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشْفِقُونَ

verse_en: Surely no one can be secure from the punishment of his Lord, --
verse_ar: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمْ غَيْرُ مَأْمُونٍۢ

verse_en: And those who guard their sex except from their wives and women slaves of old
verse_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِفُرُوجِهِمْ حَٰفِظُونَ

verse_en: Are free of blame,
verse_ar: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزْوَٰجِهِمْ أَوْ مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَٰنُهُمْ فَإِنَّهُمْ غَيْرُ مَلُومِينَ

verse_en: But those who seek more than this will be transgressors;
verse_ar: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ

verse_en: And those who fulfil their trusts and covenants,
verse_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ لِأَمَٰنَٰتِهِمْ وَعَهْدِهِمْ رَٰعُونَ

verse_en: Who uphold their testimonies,
verse_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِشَهَٰدَٰتِهِمْ قَآئِمُونَ

verse_en: And those who are mindful of their moral obligations.
verse_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمْ يُحَافِظُونَ

verse_en: They will live in gardens with honour.
verse_ar: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ فِى جَنَّٰتٍۢ مُّكْرَمُونَ

verse_en: What is the matter with unbelievers that they stare at you with fixed gazes and hasten towards you
verse_ar: فَمَالِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ قِبَلَكَ مُهْطِعِينَ

verse_en: In crowds, right and left?
verse_ar: عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ عِزِينَ

verse_en: Does every one of them wish to enter the garden of tranquility?
verse_ar: أَيَطْمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُدْخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٍۢ

verse_en: Never so. We have created them from what they know.
verse_ar: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَٰهُم مِّمَّا يَعْلَمُونَ

verse_en: So I swear by the Lord of the Easts and the Wests that We are certainly able
verse_ar: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْمَشَٰرِقِ وَٱلْمَغَٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَٰدِرُونَ

verse_en: To bring better people than they in their place; and they will not be able to thwart Us.
verse_ar: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيْرًۭا مِّنْهُمْ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ

verse_en: So leave them to their vain disputes and amusement till they meet their day (of reckoning) promised them,
verse_ar: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوضُوا۟ وَيَلْعَبُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ

verse_en: The day when they will come out of their graves in all haste as though rushing to their altars,
verse_ar: يَوْمَ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَجْدَاثِ سِرَاعًۭا كَأَنَّهُمْ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٍۢ يُوفِضُونَ

verse_en: Eyes lowered, shame attending. That is the day they have been promised!
verse_ar: خَٰشِعَةً أَبْصَٰرُهُمْ تَرْهَقُهُمْ ذِلَّةٌۭ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ

verse_en: SENT NOAH to his people to warn them before the painful punishment came upon them.
verse_ar: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦٓ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ

verse_en: He said: "O my people, I warn you clearly
verse_ar: قَالَ يَٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌ

verse_en: That you should worship God and fear Him, and follow me
verse_ar: أَنِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ

verse_en: That He may forgive some of your sins and prolong your term till an appointed time. Surely when God's appointed time is come it will not be put off, if only you knew!
verse_ar: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ

verse_en: He said: "O Lord, I called my people night and day,
verse_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِى لَيْلًۭا وَنَهَارًۭا

verse_en: But the more I called, they only ran the farther away.
verse_ar: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَآءِىٓ إِلَّا فِرَارًۭا

verse_en: And every time I called them that You may forgive them, they thrust their fingers into their ears, and covered themselves with their garments, and became wayward, and behaved with downright insolence.
verse_ar: وَإِنِّى كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوٓا۟ أَصَٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَٱسْتَغْشَوْا۟ ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا۟ وَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ ٱسْتِكْبَارًۭا

verse_en: Then I called them loudly and more openly,
verse_ar: ثُمَّ إِنِّى دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًۭا

verse_en: And declared to them in public and in private,
verse_ar: ثُمَّ إِنِّىٓ أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًۭا

verse_en: And I told them: 'Ask your Lord to forgive you. He is verily forgiving.
verse_ar: فَقُلْتُ ٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارًۭا

verse_en: He will send you abundant rain from the sky,
verse_ar: يُرْسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًۭا

verse_en: And will give you increase of wealth and sons, and give you gardens and springs of water.
verse_ar: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَٰلٍۢ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّٰتٍۢ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَٰرًۭا

verse_en: What has come upon you that you do not fear the majesty of God,
verse_ar: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًۭا

verse_en: Knowing that He has created you by various stages?
verse_ar: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا

verse_en: Do you not see how God has fashioned seven skies one above the other,
verse_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٍۢ طِبَاقًۭا

verse_en: And has placed the moon therein, an illumination, and has placed the sun, a lighted lamp?
verse_ar: وَجَعَلَ ٱلْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًۭا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًۭا

verse_en: God produced you from the earth like a vegetable growth;
verse_ar: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًۭا

verse_en: He will then return you back to it, and bring you out again.
verse_ar: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًۭا

verse_en: God has made the earth for you a spreading,
verse_ar: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًۭا

verse_en: So that you may walk upon its spacious paths.'
verse_ar: لِّتَسْلُكُوا۟ مِنْهَا سُبُلًۭا فِجَاجًۭا

verse_en: But they did not listen to me," Noah said, "and followed him whose wealth and children only added to his ruin.
verse_ar: قَالَ نُوحٌۭ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِى وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارًۭا

verse_en: And they contrived a plot of great magnitude,
verse_ar: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًۭا كُبَّارًۭا

verse_en: And said: 'Do not abandon your gods, and do not abandon Wadda or Suwa', or Yaghuth, Ya'uq or Nasr.'
verse_ar: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّۭا وَلَا سُوَاعًۭا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًۭا

verse_en: And they misled many. So do not give the evil-doers increase but in error.
verse_ar: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِيرًۭا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلًۭا

verse_en: They were drowned because of their habitual sinfulness, and sent to Hell, and did not find any helper other than God.
verse_ar: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٰٔتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا۟ فَأُدْخِلُوا۟ نَارًۭا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارًۭا

verse_en: Noah said: "O Lord, do not leave a single habitation of unbelievers on the earth.
verse_ar: وَقَالَ نُوحٌۭ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِنَ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا

verse_en: If you leave them, they will lead Your creatures astray, and beget but iniquitous and ungrateful offspring.
verse_ar: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرًۭا كَفَّارًۭا

verse_en: O Lord, forgive me, my parents, and any one who enters my house as a believer, and all believing men and women, and do not give the evil-doers increase save in ruin.
verse_ar: رَّبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَلِوَٰلِدَىَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِىَ مُؤْمِنًۭا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًۢا

verse_en: SAY: "I HAVE been informed that a number of jinns had listened; then said: 'We have heard the wondrous Qur'an,
verse_ar: قُلْ أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسْتَمَعَ نَفَرٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا قُرْءَانًا عَجَبًۭا

verse_en: Which guides to the right path; and we have come to believe in it, and will not associate any one with our Lord.
verse_ar: يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشْدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ وَلَن نُّشْرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدًۭا

verse_en: Exalted is the glory of our Lord; He has neither wife nor son.
verse_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَٰحِبَةًۭ وَلَا وَلَدًۭا

verse_en: Certainly the foolish among us say preposterous things of God.
verse_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطًۭا

verse_en: We had in fact thought that men and jinns would never speak a lie about God,
verse_ar: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلْإِنسُ وَٱلْجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًۭا

verse_en: But some men used to seek refuge with some jinns, and this increased their waywardness;
verse_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلْإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمْ رَهَقًۭا

verse_en: So they began to think, even as you do, that God would not resurrect any one.
verse_ar: وَأَنَّهُمْ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَبْعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدًۭا

verse_en: We sought to pry into the secrets of the heavens, but found it full of fierce guards and shooting flames.
verse_ar: وَأَنَّا لَمَسْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدْنَٰهَا مُلِئَتْ حَرَسًۭا شَدِيدًۭا وَشُهُبًۭا

verse_en: We sat in observatories to listen; but any one who listened found a shooting star in wait for him.
verse_ar: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقْعُدُ مِنْهَا مَقَٰعِدَ لِلسَّمْعِ ۖ فَمَن يَسْتَمِعِ ٱلْءَانَ يَجِدْ لَهُۥ شِهَابًۭا رَّصَدًۭا

verse_en: We do not know if this means ill for the dwellers of the earth, or their Lord wishes guidance for them.
verse_ar: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدْرِىٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ أَرَادَ بِهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ رَشَدًۭا

verse_en: For some of us are upright and some otherwise: Surely we follow different ways.
verse_ar: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدًۭا

verse_en: We realised that we could not weaken the power of God on earth, nor outpace Him by running away.
verse_ar: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعْجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَن نُّعْجِزَهُۥ هَرَبًۭا

verse_en: So when we heard the guidance we believed in it; and he who believes in his Lord will neither fear loss nor force.
verse_ar: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعْنَا ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ ۖ فَمَن يُؤْمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخْسًۭا وَلَا رَهَقًۭا

verse_en: Some of us have come to submission, and some of us are iniquitous.'" Those who have submitted have taken the right course;
verse_ar: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلْمُسْلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلْقَٰسِطُونَ ۖ فَمَنْ أَسْلَمَ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوْا۟ رَشَدًۭا

verse_en: But those who are iniquitous will be fuel for Hell.
verse_ar: وَأَمَّا ٱلْقَٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا۟ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبًۭا

verse_en: (Say): "If they keep to the right path We shall give them water in abundance to drink
verse_ar: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسْتَقَٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقًۭا

verse_en: In order to try them through it. But whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord, will be given increasing torment by Him."
verse_ar: لِّنَفْتِنَهُمْ فِيهِ ۚ وَمَن يُعْرِضْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسْلُكْهُ عَذَابًۭا صَعَدًۭا

verse_en: All places of worship are for God; so do not invoke any one with God.
verse_ar: وَأَنَّ ٱلْمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدْعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدًۭا

verse_en: When the devotee of God stood up to invoke Him (the jinns) crowded upon him (to listen).
verse_ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدْعُوهُ كَادُوا۟ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِ لِبَدًۭا

verse_en: Say: "I call on my Lord alone and I do not associate any one with Him."
verse_ar: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدًۭا

verse_en: Say: "Neither is your loss within my power nor bringing you to guidance."
verse_ar: قُلْ إِنِّى لَآ أَمْلِكُ لَكُمْ ضَرًّۭا وَلَا رَشَدًۭا

verse_en: Say: "No one can save me from God, nor can I find a place of refuge apart from Him,
verse_ar: قُلْ إِنِّى لَن يُجِيرَنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٌۭ وَلَنْ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلْتَحَدًا

verse_en: Unless I convey from God and deliver His message." For those who disobey God and His Apostle is the fire of Hell, where they will abide for ever;
verse_ar: إِلَّا بَلَٰغًۭا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَٰلَٰتِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يَعْصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا

verse_en: Until they see what they are promised, when they will understand who is weaker in aid and poorer in numbers.
verse_ar: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ أَضْعَفُ نَاصِرًۭا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدًۭا

verse_en: Say: "I do not know if what is promised you is near, or if my Lord prolongs its term.
verse_ar: قُلْ إِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌۭ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمْ يَجْعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّىٓ أَمَدًا

verse_en: He is the knower of the Unknown, and He does not divulge His secret to any one
verse_ar: عَٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ فَلَا يُظْهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيْبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا

verse_en: Other than an apostle He has chosen, when He makes a sentinel walk in front of him and a sentinel behind,
verse_ar: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٍۢ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسْلُكُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ رَصَدًۭا

verse_en: So that He may know if they have delivered their Lord's messages. He comprehends all that has been given them, and keeps count of everything.
verse_ar: لِّيَعْلَمَ أَن قَدْ أَبْلَغُوا۟ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّهِمْ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيْهِمْ وَأَحْصَىٰ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ عَدَدًۢا

verse_en: O YOU ENWRAPPED in the cloak (of Prophethood),
verse_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُزَّمِّلُ

verse_en: Keep watch all the night except some,
verse_ar: قُمِ ٱلَّيْلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا

verse_en: A half of it or a little less
verse_ar: نِّصْفَهُۥٓ أَوِ ٱنقُصْ مِنْهُ قَلِيلًا

verse_en: Or a little more, and recite the Qur'an slowly and distinctly.
verse_ar: أَوْ زِدْ عَلَيْهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَرْتِيلًا

verse_en: We shall soon entrust to you a message heavy (with solemnity).
verse_ar: إِنَّا سَنُلْقِى عَلَيْكَ قَوْلًۭا ثَقِيلًا

verse_en: Surely in the watches of the night the soul is most receptive and words more telling.
verse_ar: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيْلِ هِىَ أَشَدُّ وَطْـًۭٔا وَأَقْوَمُ قِيلًا

verse_en: Indeed during the day you have a long schedule of occupations.
verse_ar: إِنَّ لَكَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبْحًۭا طَوِيلًۭا

verse_en: But recite the name of your Lord withdrawing yourself from everything, devoting yourself exclusively to Him.
verse_ar: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلْ إِلَيْهِ تَبْتِيلًۭا

verse_en: He is the Lord of the East and the West. There is no god but He. So take Him alone as your protector.
verse_ar: رَّبُّ ٱلْمَشْرِقِ وَٱلْمَغْرِبِ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذْهُ وَكِيلًۭا

verse_en: Bear with patience what they say, and gracefully come away from them.
verse_ar: وَٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهْجُرْهُمْ هَجْرًۭا جَمِيلًۭا

verse_en: Leave those to Me who deny, the lovers of ease and comfort; and bear with them for a while.
verse_ar: وَذَرْنِى وَٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ أُو۟لِى ٱلنَّعْمَةِ وَمَهِّلْهُمْ قَلِيلًا

verse_en: Verily We shall have fetters with Us, and a roaring furnace,
verse_ar: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَآ أَنكَالًۭا وَجَحِيمًۭا

verse_en: And food that will stick in the throat, and painful torment
verse_ar: وَطَعَامًۭا ذَا غُصَّةٍۢ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا

verse_en: On the day the earth and mountains will rock violently, and the mountains turn to a heap of poured-out sand.
verse_ar: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًۭا مَّهِيلًا

verse_en: We have sent an Apostle to you as a witness against you, as We had sent an apostle to the Pharaoh.
verse_ar: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًۭا شَٰهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًۭا

verse_en: But the Pharaoh disobeyed the apostle; so We seized him with a grievous punishment.
verse_ar: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَٰهُ أَخْذًۭا وَبِيلًۭا

verse_en: How then, if you disbelieve, will you preserve yourselves on the day which will even turn the children hoary?
verse_ar: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًۭا يَجْعَلُ ٱلْوِلْدَٰنَ شِيبًا

verse_en: The heavens itself will be rent asunder (on that day). His promise is bound to be fulfilled.
verse_ar: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرٌۢ بِهِۦ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَفْعُولًا

verse_en: Verily this is a reminder. So let him who desires take the way to his Lord.
verse_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌۭ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

verse_en: Your Lord surely knows that you are occupied with your devotions for nearly two-thirds of the night, or half the night, or one-third of it, as do many others with you. Yet God prescribes the measure of night and day. He knows you cannot calculate it, and so turns to you in benevolence. So recite as much of the Qur'an as you can easily. He knows some among you will be sick, and some will be travelling over the earth in search of the bounty of God, and some fighting in the way of God. So read as much from it as you can easily, and be firm in devotion, pay the zakat, and lend a goodly loan to God. And what you send for yourself of the good, you will find it with God better and greater in reward. So ask for God's forgiveness. Indeed God is forgiving and kind.
verse_ar: ۞ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَىِ ٱلَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُۥ وَثُلُثَهُۥ وَطَآئِفَةٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلْقُرْءَانِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ ۙ وَءَاخَرُونَ يُقَٰتِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ فَٱقْرَءُوا۟ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًۭا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍۢ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًۭا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًۭا ۚ وَٱسْتَغْفِرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۢ

verse_en: O YOU ENFOLDED in your mantle (of reform),
verse_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْمُدَّثِّرُ

verse_en: Arise and warn,
verse_ar: قُمْ فَأَنذِرْ

verse_en: Glorify your Lord,
verse_ar: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ

verse_en: Purify your inner self,
verse_ar: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ

verse_en: And banish all trepidation.
verse_ar: وَٱلرُّجْزَ فَٱهْجُرْ

verse_en: Do not bestow favours in expectation of return,
verse_ar: وَلَا تَمْنُن تَسْتَكْثِرُ

verse_en: And persevere in the way of your Lord.
verse_ar: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَٱصْبِرْ

verse_en: For when the trumpet blows
verse_ar: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِى ٱلنَّاقُورِ

verse_en: It will be a day of distress,
verse_ar: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ

verse_en: Dolorous for the unbelievers.
verse_ar: عَلَى ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍۢ

verse_en: Leave him to Me whom I created alone,
verse_ar: ذَرْنِى وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًۭا

verse_en: And gave him abundant wealth
verse_ar: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُۥ مَالًۭا مَّمْدُودًۭا

verse_en: And sons always present by his side,
verse_ar: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًۭا

verse_en: And made things easy for them.
verse_ar: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُۥ تَمْهِيدًۭا

verse_en: Yet he wants that I should give him more.
verse_ar: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ

verse_en: Never. He is refractory of Our signs.
verse_ar: كَلَّآ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لِءَايَٰتِنَا عَنِيدًۭا

verse_en: I shall inflict on him hardship,
verse_ar: سَأُرْهِقُهُۥ صَعُودًا

verse_en: For he had thought and calculated.
verse_ar: إِنَّهُۥ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ

verse_en: May he be accursed, how he planned!
verse_ar: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ

verse_en: May be then be accursed, how he plotted!
verse_ar: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ

verse_en: Then he looked around,
verse_ar: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ

verse_en: And frowned and puckered his brow,
verse_ar: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ

verse_en: Then turned his back and waxed proud,
verse_ar: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَٱسْتَكْبَرَ

verse_en: And said: "This is nothing but the magic of old,
verse_ar: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌۭ يُؤْثَرُ

verse_en: Nothing more than the speech of a man!"
verse_ar: إِنْ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا قَوْلُ ٱلْبَشَرِ

verse_en: I will cast him into the fire of Hell.
verse_ar: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ

verse_en: What do you think Hell-fire is?
verse_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سَقَرُ

verse_en: It leaves nothing, nor does it spare;
verse_ar: لَا تُبْقِى وَلَا تَذَرُ

verse_en: It glows and burns the skin.
verse_ar: لَوَّاحَةٌۭ لِّلْبَشَرِ

verse_en: Over it are nineteen (guards).
verse_ar: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ

verse_en: We have not appointed any one but angels as keepers of Hell, and their number that We have fixed is to make it a means of contention for disbelievers, so that those who were given the Book may be certain, and the faith of the believers may have greater increase, and the people of the Book and believers may not be deceived, and the sceptics and infidels may say: "What does God mean by this parable?" That is how God leads whosoever He will astray, and guides whosoever He will. None knows the armies of your Lord save Him self. This is no more than reminder for mankind.
verse_ar: وَمَا جَعَلْنَآ أَصْحَٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَٰٓئِكَةًۭ ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةًۭ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَيَزْدَادَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِيمَٰنًۭا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ وَٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَٰذَا مَثَلًۭا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِىَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ

verse_en: I say the truth, and call the moon to witness,
verse_ar: كَلَّا وَٱلْقَمَرِ

verse_en: And the night when on the wane,
verse_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ

verse_en: The morning when it is unveiled,
verse_ar: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَآ أَسْفَرَ

verse_en: That (Hell) is surely one of the greater (signs),
verse_ar: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى ٱلْكُبَرِ

verse_en: A warning for people --
verse_ar: نَذِيرًۭا لِّلْبَشَرِ

verse_en: Whoever of you desires to progress or lag behind.
verse_ar: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ

verse_en: Every soul is pledged to what it does,
verse_ar: كُلُّ نَفْسٍۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ

verse_en: Except those of the right hand
verse_ar: إِلَّآ أَصْحَٰبَ ٱلْيَمِينِ

verse_en: Sitting in the gardens, asking
verse_ar: فِى جَنَّٰتٍۢ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

verse_en: Of evil-doers:
verse_ar: عَنِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ

verse_en: "What was it that brought you to Hell?"
verse_ar: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِى سَقَرَ

verse_en: They will answer: "We did not fulfil our devotional obligations,
verse_ar: قَالُوا۟ لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ ٱلْمُصَلِّينَ

verse_en: And did not feed the needy,
verse_ar: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ ٱلْمِسْكِينَ

verse_en: And plunged into useless things with those who were obstinate,
verse_ar: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ ٱلْخَآئِضِينَ

verse_en: And rejected the Day of Judgement as a lie
verse_ar: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ

verse_en: Until the certainty (of death) had come upon us.
verse_ar: حَتَّىٰٓ أَتَىٰنَا ٱلْيَقِينُ

verse_en: So, the intercession of intercessors will not avail them.
verse_ar: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَٰعَةُ ٱلشَّٰفِعِينَ

verse_en: Why then do they turn away from the admonition
verse_ar: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ ٱلتَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ

verse_en: As though they were frightened asses
verse_ar: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌۭ مُّسْتَنفِرَةٌۭ

verse_en: Fleeing from a lion?
verse_ar: فَرَّتْ مِن قَسْوَرَةٍۭ

verse_en: In fact every one of them wants to be given open books (like the prophets).
verse_ar: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمْرِئٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًۭا مُّنَشَّرَةًۭ

verse_en: By no means. In fact they do not fear the Hereafter.
verse_ar: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةَ

verse_en: Never so, as this is a reminder.
verse_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُۥ تَذْكِرَةٌۭ

verse_en: Let him then who heeds remember it.
verse_ar: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ

verse_en: But they will not remember except as God wills: He is worthy to be feared, and He is worthy of forgiving
verse_ar: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ ٱلْمَغْفِرَةِ

verse_en: I CALL TO WITNESS the Day of Resurrection,
verse_ar: لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ

verse_en: And I call the reprehensive soul to witness:
verse_ar: وَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلنَّفْسِ ٱللَّوَّامَةِ

verse_en: Does man think We shall not put his bones together?
verse_ar: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ أَلَّن نَّجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُۥ

verse_en: Surely We are able to reform even his finger-tips.
verse_ar: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّىَ بَنَانَهُۥ

verse_en: Yet man is sceptical of what is right before him.
verse_ar: بَلْ يُرِيدُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُۥ

verse_en: He asks: "When will the Day of Resurrection be?"
verse_ar: يَسْـَٔلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلْقِيَٰمَةِ

verse_en: Yet when the eyes are dazzled,
verse_ar: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ ٱلْبَصَرُ

verse_en: The moon eclipsed,
verse_ar: وَخَسَفَ ٱلْقَمَرُ

verse_en: And the sun and moon are conjoined,
verse_ar: وَجُمِعَ ٱلشَّمْسُ وَٱلْقَمَرُ

verse_en: That day man will say: "Where can I find escape?"
verse_ar: يَقُولُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ ٱلْمَفَرُّ

verse_en: Never so, for there will be no escape.
verse_ar: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ

verse_en: With your Lord alone will be the retreat on that day.
verse_ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمُسْتَقَرُّ

verse_en: Then man will be told what he had sent ahead (of good) and what he had left behind.
verse_ar: يُنَبَّؤُا۟ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

verse_en: In fact man is a witness against himself,
verse_ar: بَلِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِۦ بَصِيرَةٌۭ

verse_en: Whatever the excuses he may offer.
verse_ar: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُۥ

verse_en: Do not forestall (the revelation before its completion) by acting in haste.
verse_ar: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِۦٓ

verse_en: Surely its collection and recitation are Our responsibility.
verse_ar: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُۥ وَقُرْءَانَهُۥ

verse_en: So, as We recite it, follow its reading.
verse_ar: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَٰهُ فَٱتَّبِعْ قُرْءَانَهُۥ

verse_en: The exposition of its meaning surely rests on Us.
verse_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُۥ

verse_en: But no. You love this transient life,
verse_ar: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ

verse_en: And neglect the Hereafter.
verse_ar: وَتَذَرُونَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةَ

verse_en: How many faces will be refulgent on that Day,
verse_ar: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ نَّاضِرَةٌ

verse_en: Waiting for their Lord.
verse_ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌۭ

verse_en: And how many faces on that Day will be woe-begone
verse_ar: وَوُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بَاسِرَةٌۭ

verse_en: Fearing that a great disaster is going to befall them.
verse_ar: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌۭ

verse_en: Never so, for when life withdraws into the clavicula,
verse_ar: كَلَّآ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلتَّرَاقِىَ

verse_en: And it is asked: "Is there any reciter of charms and amulets?"
verse_ar: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍۢ

verse_en: He will then realise it is the parting,
verse_ar: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ ٱلْفِرَاقُ

verse_en: And anguish will be heaped upon anguish:
verse_ar: وَٱلْتَفَّتِ ٱلسَّاقُ بِٱلسَّاقِ

verse_en: To your Lord then will be the driving.
verse_ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ ٱلْمَسَاقُ

verse_en: For he neither believed nor prayed,
verse_ar: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ

verse_en: But only disavowed and turned away;
verse_ar: وَلَٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

verse_en: Then he strutted back to his people.
verse_ar: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ يَتَمَطَّىٰٓ

verse_en: Alas the woe for you, alas!
verse_ar: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ

verse_en: Alas, the woe for you!
verse_ar: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰٓ

verse_en: Does man think that he will be left alone to himself, free?
verse_ar: أَيَحْسَبُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى

verse_en: Was he not an emitted drop of semen,
verse_ar: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةًۭ مِّن مَّنِىٍّۢ يُمْنَىٰ

verse_en: Then formed into an embryo? Then He fashioned, shaped and proportioned
verse_ar: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةًۭ فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ

verse_en: And assigned it sexes, male and female.
verse_ar: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ ٱلزَّوْجَيْنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ

verse_en: Cannot such as He bring the dead to life?
verse_ar: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحْۦِىَ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ

verse_en: WAS THERE NOT a time in the life of man when he was not even a mentionable thing?
verse_ar: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَٰنِ حِينٌۭ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًۭٔا مَّذْكُورًا

verse_en: Verily We created man from a sperm yoked (to the ovum) to bring out his real substance, then gave him hearing and sight.
verse_ar: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍۢ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا

verse_en: We surely showed him the way that he may either be grateful or deny.
verse_ar: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًۭا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

verse_en: We have prepared for unbelievers chains and collars and a blazing fire.
verse_ar: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَٰلًۭا وَسَعِيرًا

verse_en: Surely the devotees will drink cups flavoured with palm blossoms
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍۢ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

verse_en: From a spring of which the votaries of God will drink and make it flow in abundance.
verse_ar: عَيْنًۭا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًۭا

verse_en: Those who fulfil their vows and fear the Day whose evil shall be diffused far and wide,
verse_ar: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًۭا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًۭا

verse_en: And feed the needy for the love of Him, and the orphans and the captives,
verse_ar: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًۭا وَيَتِيمًۭا وَأَسِيرًا

verse_en: (Saying): "We feed you for the sake of God, desiring neither recompense nor thanks.
verse_ar: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءًۭ وَلَا شُكُورًا

verse_en: We fear the dismal day calamitous from our Lord."
verse_ar: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًۭا قَمْطَرِيرًۭا

verse_en: So God will protect them from the evil of that day, and grant them happiness and joy,
verse_ar: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةًۭ وَسُرُورًۭا

verse_en: And reward them for their perseverence Paradise and silken robes,
verse_ar: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةًۭ وَحَرِيرًۭا

verse_en: Where they will recline on couches feeling neither heat of the sun nor intense cold.
verse_ar: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًۭا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًۭا

verse_en: The shadows will bend over them, and low will hang the clusters of grapes.
verse_ar: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًۭا

verse_en: Passed round will be silver flagons and goblets made of glass,
verse_ar: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍۢ مِّن فِضَّةٍۢ وَأَكْوَابٍۢ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠

verse_en: And crystal clear bottles of silver, of which they will determine the measure themselves.
verse_ar: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍۢ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًۭا

verse_en: There will they drink a cup flavoured with ginger
verse_ar: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًۭا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا

verse_en: From a spring by the name of Ever-flowing-Salsabil.
verse_ar: عَيْنًۭا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًۭا

verse_en: And boys of everlasting youth will go about attending them. Looking at them you would think that they were pearls dispersed.
verse_ar: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌۭ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًۭا مَّنثُورًۭا

verse_en: When you look around, you will see delights and great dominion.
verse_ar: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًۭا وَمُلْكًۭا كَبِيرًا

verse_en: On their bodies will be garments of the finest green silk and brocade, and they will be adorned with bracelets of silver; and their Lord will give them a purest draught to drink.
verse_ar: عَٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌۭ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌۭ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍۢ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًۭا طَهُورًا

verse_en: "This in truth is your recompense, and acceptance of your endeavours."
verse_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءًۭ وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا

verse_en: We have revealed the Qur'an to you gradually;
verse_ar: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًۭا

verse_en: So wait for your Lord's command, and do not follow any sinner or disbeliever among them.
verse_ar: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًۭا

verse_en: Meditate upon the name of your Lord morning and evening;
verse_ar: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةًۭ وَأَصِيلًۭا

verse_en: And bow in homage part of the night, and glorify Him far into the night.
verse_ar: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًۭا طَوِيلًا

verse_en: Surely men love what hastes away and forget the grievous day (ahead).
verse_ar: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًۭا ثَقِيلًۭا

verse_en: We created them and fixed their bones and joints; and We could replace them when We like with others like them.
verse_ar: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا

verse_en: This surely is a reminder: Therefore whosoever desires may take the way to his Lord.
verse_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌۭ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًۭا

verse_en: But you will not desire except as God wills. Verily He is all-knowing and all-wise.
verse_ar: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًۭا

verse_en: He admits whosoever He will to His benevolence. But for the evil-doers He has prepared a painful punishment.
verse_ar: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا

verse_en: I CALL TO WITNESS those who are sent consecutively,
verse_ar: وَٱلْمُرْسَلَٰتِ عُرْفًۭا

verse_en: And those that strike violently,
verse_ar: فَٱلْعَٰصِفَٰتِ عَصْفًۭا

verse_en: And those that revive by quickening,
verse_ar: وَٱلنَّٰشِرَٰتِ نَشْرًۭا

verse_en: And those that distinguish distinctly,
verse_ar: فَٱلْفَٰرِقَٰتِ فَرْقًۭا

verse_en: And those that bring down the Reminder
verse_ar: فَٱلْمُلْقِيَٰتِ ذِكْرًا

verse_en: To end all argument or to warn.
verse_ar: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا

verse_en: What is promised will surely come to pass.
verse_ar: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَٰقِعٌۭ

verse_en: When the stars are obliterated,
verse_ar: فَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ

verse_en: The heavens split asunder,
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ فُرِجَتْ

verse_en: The mountains reduced to dust and blown away,
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ

verse_en: And when the time comes for raising the little girls (buried alive) --
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ

verse_en: For what day is that time fixed?
verse_ar: لِأَىِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ

verse_en: The Day of Judgement.
verse_ar: لِيَوْمِ ٱلْفَصْلِ

verse_en: How will you comprehend what the Day of Judgement is?
verse_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ

verse_en: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
verse_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verse_en: Have We not destroyed the earlier generations?
verse_ar: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

verse_en: So shall We make the later ones to follow them.
verse_ar: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ ٱلْءَاخِرِينَ

verse_en: That is what We shall do to those who are guilty of crime.
verse_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ

verse_en: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
verse_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verse_en: Did We not create you from contemptible water?
verse_ar: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّآءٍۢ مَّهِينٍۢ

verse_en: Then We lodged you in a secure place (the womb)
verse_ar: فَجَعَلْنَٰهُ فِى قَرَارٍۢ مَّكِينٍ

verse_en: For a certain appointed time,
verse_ar: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍۢ مَّعْلُومٍۢ

verse_en: Then We facilitated (your birth). How well do We calculate!
verse_ar: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْقَٰدِرُونَ

verse_en: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
verse_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verse_en: Have We not made the earth a repository
verse_ar: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا

verse_en: For the living and the dead,
verse_ar: أَحْيَآءًۭ وَأَمْوَٰتًۭا

verse_en: And placed in it lofty and broad stablisers, and gave you sweet water to drink?
verse_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ شَٰمِخَٰتٍۢ وَأَسْقَيْنَٰكُم مَّآءًۭ فُرَاتًۭا

verse_en: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
verse_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verse_en: "Go to what you used to deny;
verse_ar: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

verse_en: Go to the shadow with three ramifications,
verse_ar: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّۢ ذِى ثَلَٰثِ شُعَبٍۢ

verse_en: Neither shady nor protecting against the blazing Fire.
verse_ar: لَّا ظَلِيلٍۢ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ

verse_en: It will throw out sparks as logs of wood
verse_ar: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِى بِشَرَرٍۢ كَٱلْقَصْرِ

verse_en: So like golden camels."
verse_ar: كَأَنَّهُۥ جِمَٰلَتٌۭ صُفْرٌۭ

verse_en: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
verse_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verse_en: They will not be able to speak that day,
verse_ar: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ

verse_en: Nor given leave to make excuses.
verse_ar: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ

verse_en: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
verse_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verse_en: That will be the Day of Reckoning. Gathered will be (you) and the earlier (generations).
verse_ar: هَٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَٰكُمْ وَٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

verse_en: So if you have any plot to devise against Me, then devise it.
verse_ar: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌۭ فَكِيدُونِ

verse_en: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
verse_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verse_en: Those who take heed for themselves and fear God, will be amidst shade and springs of water,
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى ظِلَٰلٍۢ وَعُيُونٍۢ

verse_en: And such fruits as they desire.
verse_ar: وَفَوَٰكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ

verse_en: "Eat and drink with relish as reward for what you had done."
verse_ar: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

verse_en: That is how We reward the good.
verse_ar: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

verse_en: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
verse_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verse_en: Eat and enjoy for a while: You are certainly sinners.
verse_ar: كُلُوا۟ وَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ

verse_en: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
verse_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verse_en: When it is said to them: "Bow in homage," they do not bow.
verse_ar: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ لَا يَرْكَعُونَ

verse_en: Alas the woe that day for those who deny!
verse_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verse_en: In what other lore after this will they then believe?
verse_ar: فَبِأَىِّ حَدِيثٍۭ بَعْدَهُۥ يُؤْمِنُونَ

verse_en: OF WHAT ARE they asking one another?
verse_ar: عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

verse_en: (Is it) of the great announcement
verse_ar: عَنِ ٱلنَّبَإِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

verse_en: About which they have been differing?
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِى هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ

verse_en: Indeed they will come to know soon;
verse_ar: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ

verse_en: They will indeed come to know soon.
verse_ar: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ

verse_en: Did We not make the earth a spreading,
verse_ar: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ ٱلْأَرْضَ مِهَٰدًۭا

verse_en: The mountains tent-pins?
verse_ar: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًۭا

verse_en: We created you in pairs,
verse_ar: وَخَلَقْنَٰكُمْ أَزْوَٰجًۭا

verse_en: And made sleep for you to rest,
verse_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًۭا

verse_en: The night a covering,
verse_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلَّيْلَ لِبَاسًۭا

verse_en: And the day for seeking livelihood.
verse_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلنَّهَارَ مَعَاشًۭا

verse_en: We raised over you several secure (skies),
verse_ar: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًۭا شِدَادًۭا

verse_en: And placed a lamp therein brightly burning.
verse_ar: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًۭا وَهَّاجًۭا

verse_en: And We sent down rain from water-laden clouds pouring in torrents
verse_ar: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلْمُعْصِرَٰتِ مَآءًۭ ثَجَّاجًۭا

verse_en: That We may produce from it grain and vegetation,
verse_ar: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِۦ حَبًّۭا وَنَبَاتًۭا

verse_en: And orchards full of trees and interlacing boughs.
verse_ar: وَجَنَّٰتٍ أَلْفَافًا

verse_en: Surely a time is fixed for the Day of Judgement.
verse_ar: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَٰتًۭا

verse_en: The day the trumpet blast is sounded you will come in hordes;
verse_ar: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًۭا

verse_en: The heavens will be opened wide and turn into so many doors,
verse_ar: وَفُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَٰبًۭا

verse_en: The mountains put in motion turning into a mirage.
verse_ar: وَسُيِّرَتِ ٱلْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا

verse_en: Certainly Hell lies in wait,
verse_ar: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًۭا

verse_en: The rebels' abode,
verse_ar: لِّلطَّٰغِينَ مَـَٔابًۭا

verse_en: Where they will remain for aeons,
verse_ar: لَّٰبِثِينَ فِيهَآ أَحْقَابًۭا

verse_en: Finding neither sleep nor any thing to drink
verse_ar: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًۭا وَلَا شَرَابًا

verse_en: Except boiling water and benumbing cold:
verse_ar: إِلَّا حَمِيمًۭا وَغَسَّاقًۭا

verse_en: , A fitting reward.
verse_ar: جَزَآءًۭ وِفَاقًا

verse_en: They were those who did not expect a reckoning,
verse_ar: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًۭا

verse_en: And rejected Our signs as lies.
verse_ar: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كِذَّابًۭا

verse_en: We have kept account of everything in a book.
verse_ar: وَكُلَّ شَىْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَٰهُ كِتَٰبًۭا

verse_en: So taste (the fruit of what you sowed), for We shall add nothing but torment,
verse_ar: فَذُوقُوا۟ فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا

verse_en: As for those who preserve themselves from evil and follow the straight path, there is attainment for them:
verse_ar: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا

verse_en: Orchards and vineyards,
verse_ar: حَدَآئِقَ وَأَعْنَٰبًۭا

verse_en: And graceful maidens of the same age,
verse_ar: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًۭا

verse_en: And flasks full and flowing.
verse_ar: وَكَأْسًۭا دِهَاقًۭا

verse_en: They will hear no blasphemies there or disavowals:
verse_ar: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًۭا وَلَا كِذَّٰبًۭا

verse_en: A recompense from your Lord, a sufficient gift,
verse_ar: جَزَآءًۭ مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَآءً حِسَابًۭا

verse_en: The Lord of the heavens and the earth, and all that lies between them, most benevolent, to whom none may dare address a word.
verse_ar: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًۭا

verse_en: The day the Spirit takes its stand, with the angels ranged in rows. None will speak except who is permitted by Ar-Rahman and says what is right.
verse_ar: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ صَفًّۭا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًۭا

verse_en: That day is certain. So whosoever likes may prepare a way to his Lord.
verse_ar: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا

verse_en: We have indeed warned you of a calamity near at hand, a day when man will see what he had sent (of his deeds) ahead, and the unbeliever will say: "Woe alas. Ah would that I were dust!"
verse_ar: إِنَّآ أَنذَرْنَٰكُمْ عَذَابًۭا قَرِيبًۭا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلْكَافِرُ يَٰلَيْتَنِى كُنتُ تُرَٰبًۢا

verse_en: I CALL TO WITNESS those who dive and drag,
verse_ar: وَٱلنَّٰزِعَٰتِ غَرْقًۭا

verse_en: And those who undo the bonds gently,
verse_ar: وَٱلنَّٰشِطَٰتِ نَشْطًۭا

verse_en: And those who glide swimmingly,
verse_ar: وَٱلسَّٰبِحَٰتِ سَبْحًۭا

verse_en: Then outpace the others swiftly
verse_ar: فَٱلسَّٰبِقَٰتِ سَبْقًۭا

verse_en: And direct affairs by command,
verse_ar: فَٱلْمُدَبِّرَٰتِ أَمْرًۭا

verse_en: The day the convulsive (first blast) shatters convulsively
verse_ar: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ ٱلرَّاجِفَةُ

verse_en: Followed by the second blast,
verse_ar: تَتْبَعُهَا ٱلرَّادِفَةُ

verse_en: Hearts will pound loudly on that day,
verse_ar: قُلُوبٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ وَاجِفَةٌ

verse_en: Eyes be lowered in submission.
verse_ar: أَبْصَٰرُهَا خَٰشِعَةٌۭ

verse_en: They say: "Shall we go back to our original state
verse_ar: يَقُولُونَ أَءِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِى ٱلْحَافِرَةِ

verse_en: After having turned to carious bones?"
verse_ar: أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَٰمًۭا نَّخِرَةًۭ

verse_en: They say: "Then this returning will be a dead loss."
verse_ar: قَالُوا۟ تِلْكَ إِذًۭا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌۭ

verse_en: It will only be a single blast,
verse_ar: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌۭ وَٰحِدَةٌۭ

verse_en: And they will wake up suddenly.
verse_ar: فَإِذَا هُم بِٱلسَّاهِرَةِ

verse_en: Has the story of Moses come to you
verse_ar: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ

verse_en: When his Lord called to him in Tuwa's holy vale?
verse_ar: إِذْ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلْوَادِ ٱلْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

verse_en: "Go to the Pharaoh who has become refractory,
verse_ar: ٱذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ

verse_en: And say: 'Would you like to grow (in virtue)?
verse_ar: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ

verse_en: Then I will guide you to your Lord that you may come to fear Him.'"
verse_ar: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ

verse_en: So he showed him the greater sign;
verse_ar: فَأَرَىٰهُ ٱلْءَايَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ

verse_en: But (the Pharaoh) disavowed and disobeyed.
verse_ar: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ

verse_en: Then he turned away, deliberating,
verse_ar: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ

verse_en: And assembled (his council) and proclaimed,
verse_ar: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ

verse_en: Saying: "I am alone your lord, the highest of them all."
verse_ar: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ

verse_en: So God seized him for the punishment of the Hereafter and this world.
verse_ar: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّهُ نَكَالَ ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ وَٱلْأُولَىٰٓ

verse_en: Truly there is a lesson in this for those who fear (the consequences).
verse_ar: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةًۭ لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰٓ

verse_en: Are you more difficult to create or the heavens? He built it,
verse_ar: ءَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ ۚ بَنَىٰهَا

verse_en: Raised it high, proportioned it,
verse_ar: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّىٰهَا

verse_en: Gave darkness to its night, and brightness to its day;
verse_ar: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَىٰهَا

verse_en: And afterwards spread out the earth.
verse_ar: وَٱلْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَىٰهَآ

verse_en: He brought out its water and its pastures from it,
verse_ar: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَآءَهَا وَمَرْعَىٰهَا

verse_en: And stabilized the mountains
verse_ar: وَٱلْجِبَالَ أَرْسَىٰهَا

verse_en: As convenience for you and your cattle.
verse_ar: مَتَٰعًۭا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَٰمِكُمْ

verse_en: When the great calamity comes,
verse_ar: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلطَّآمَّةُ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ

verse_en: The day when man remembers all that he had done,
verse_ar: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا سَعَىٰ

verse_en: And Hell made visible to him who can see,
verse_ar: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ

verse_en: Then he who had been rebellious
verse_ar: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ

verse_en: And who preferred the life of the world,
verse_ar: وَءَاثَرَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا

verse_en: Will surely have Hell for his abode.
verse_ar: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ

verse_en: But he who feared standing before his Lord, and restrained his self from vain desires,
verse_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفْسَ عَنِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ

verse_en: Will surely have Paradise for abode.
verse_ar: فَإِنَّ ٱلْجَنَّةَ هِىَ ٱلْمَأْوَىٰ

verse_en: They ask you: "When will the Hour be? When is its time fixed?"
verse_ar: يَسْـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَىٰهَا

verse_en: What do you have to do with explaining it?
verse_ar: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَىٰهَآ

verse_en: The extent of its knowledge goes to your Lord.
verse_ar: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَآ

verse_en: Your duty is only to warn him who fears it.
verse_ar: إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰهَا

verse_en: The day they see it, it will seem they had stayed in the world but only an evening or its turning into dawn.
verse_ar: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَىٰهَا

verse_en: HE FROWNED AND turned away,
verse_ar: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ

verse_en: Because a blind man came to him.
verse_ar: أَن جَآءَهُ ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ

verse_en: What made you think that he will not grow in virtue,
verse_ar: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ يَزَّكَّىٰٓ

verse_en: Or be admonished, and the admonition profit him?
verse_ar: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰٓ

verse_en: As for him who is not in want of any thing,
verse_ar: أَمَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰ

verse_en: You pay full attention,
verse_ar: فَأَنتَ لَهُۥ تَصَدَّىٰ

verse_en: Though it is not your concern if he should not grow (in fulness).
verse_ar: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ

verse_en: As for him who comes to you striving (after goodness),
verse_ar: وَأَمَّا مَن جَآءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ

verse_en: And is also fearful (of God),
verse_ar: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ

verse_en: You neglect.
verse_ar: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ

verse_en: Assuredly this is a reminder
verse_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌۭ

verse_en: For any one who desires to bear it in mind,
verse_ar: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ

verse_en: (Contained) in honoured pages,
verse_ar: فِى صُحُفٍۢ مُّكَرَّمَةٍۢ

verse_en: Exalted and holy,
verse_ar: مَّرْفُوعَةٍۢ مُّطَهَّرَةٍۭ

verse_en: In the hands of scribes
verse_ar: بِأَيْدِى سَفَرَةٍۢ

verse_en: Noble and pious.
verse_ar: كِرَامٍۭ بَرَرَةٍۢ

verse_en: Accursed is man. How ungrateful is he!
verse_ar: قُتِلَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَآ أَكْفَرَهُۥ

verse_en: Of what substance God created him?
verse_ar: مِنْ أَىِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ

verse_en: From a single sperm He created, then proportioned him,
verse_ar: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ

verse_en: Then made his passage easy (at birth);
verse_ar: ثُمَّ ٱلسَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُۥ

verse_en: He will then send him to death and have him laid in the grave.
verse_ar: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقْبَرَهُۥ

verse_en: Then He will raise him up again when He please.
verse_ar: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَآءَ أَنشَرَهُۥ

verse_en: But no. He has not fulfilled what was enjoined on him.
verse_ar: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَآ أَمَرَهُۥ

verse_en: Let man therefore consider (the sources of) his food.
verse_ar: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ

verse_en: We poured down rain abundantly,
verse_ar: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا ٱلْمَآءَ صَبًّۭا

verse_en: Then We cracked the earth open under pressure (of germination)
verse_ar: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا ٱلْأَرْضَ شَقًّۭا

verse_en: And We made corn grow,
verse_ar: فَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّۭا

verse_en: And grapes and herbage,
verse_ar: وَعِنَبًۭا وَقَضْبًۭا

verse_en: Olives and dates,
verse_ar: وَزَيْتُونًۭا وَنَخْلًۭا

verse_en: Orchards thick with trees,
verse_ar: وَحَدَآئِقَ غُلْبًۭا

verse_en: And fruits and fodder:
verse_ar: وَفَٰكِهَةًۭ وَأَبًّۭا

verse_en: A provision for you and your cattle.
verse_ar: مَّتَٰعًۭا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَٰمِكُمْ

verse_en: But when the great calamity comes
verse_ar: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلصَّآخَّةُ

verse_en: Man will fly from his brother,
verse_ar: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ ٱلْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ

verse_en: Mother and father,
verse_ar: وَأُمِّهِۦ وَأَبِيهِ

verse_en: As well as his wife and children.
verse_ar: وَصَٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَبَنِيهِ

verse_en: Each man will have enough cares that day.
verse_ar: لِكُلِّ ٱمْرِئٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ شَأْنٌۭ يُغْنِيهِ

verse_en: Many faces will that day be bright,
verse_ar: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ مُّسْفِرَةٌۭ

verse_en: Laughing and full of joy,
verse_ar: ضَاحِكَةٌۭ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌۭ

verse_en: And many will be dust-begrimed,
verse_ar: وَوُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌۭ

verse_en: Covered with the blackness (of shame):
verse_ar: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ

verse_en: They will be the unbelievers, transgressors.
verse_ar: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْكَفَرَةُ ٱلْفَجَرَةُ

verse_en: WHEN THE SUN is folded up,
verse_ar: إِذَا ٱلشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ

verse_en: The stars turn dim and scatter,
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ ٱنكَدَرَتْ

verse_en: The mountains made to move,
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ

verse_en: The ten-month pregnant female camels are abandoned,
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ

verse_en: The wild beasts stampede on the run,
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ

verse_en: When the oceans surge and swell,
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ

verse_en: When souls are reunited (with the bodies)
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ

verse_en: And the little girl buried alive is asked
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْمَوْءُۥدَةُ سُئِلَتْ

verse_en: For what crime she was put to death;
verse_ar: بِأَىِّ ذَنۢبٍۢ قُتِلَتْ

verse_en: When the ledgers are laid open,
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ

verse_en: The curtain drawn back from the skies,
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ كُشِطَتْ

verse_en: When Hell is set ablaze,
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ

verse_en: And Paradise brought near,
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ

verse_en: (Then) every soul will know what it had prepared (for itself).
verse_ar: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌۭ مَّآ أَحْضَرَتْ

verse_en: So, I call the receding stars to witness,
verse_ar: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلْخُنَّسِ

verse_en: The planets withdrawing into themselves,
verse_ar: ٱلْجَوَارِ ٱلْكُنَّسِ

verse_en: The closing night,
verse_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ

verse_en: The rising dawn,
verse_ar: وَٱلصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ

verse_en: That this is indeed the word of an honoured Messenger,
verse_ar: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍۢ كَرِيمٍۢ

verse_en: Full of power, well-established (in position) with the Lord and Master of the Throne,
verse_ar: ذِى قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِى ٱلْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍۢ

verse_en: Obeyed and worthy there of trust.
verse_ar: مُّطَاعٍۢ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍۢ

verse_en: Your companion is not mad.
verse_ar: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍۢ

verse_en: He had surely seen Him on the clear horizon.
verse_ar: وَلَقَدْ رَءَاهُ بِٱلْأُفُقِ ٱلْمُبِينِ

verse_en: He is not chary of making public what is unknown.
verse_ar: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى ٱلْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍۢ

verse_en: This is not the utterance of an accursed devil.
verse_ar: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَٰنٍۢ رَّجِيمٍۢ

verse_en: So whither do you stray?
verse_ar: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ

verse_en: This is a reminder for all the peoples of the world,
verse_ar: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌۭ لِّلْعَٰلَمِينَ

verse_en: For those of you who desire to walk the path that is straight,
verse_ar: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ

verse_en: Though you cannot desire except as God will, the Lord of all the worlds.
verse_ar: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ

verse_en: WHEN THE SKY is split asunder,
verse_ar: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنفَطَرَتْ

verse_en: And the stars dispersed,
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتْ

verse_en: When the oceans begin to flow,
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ

verse_en: When the graves are overturned,
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ

verse_en: Each soul will know what it had sent ahead and what it had left behind.
verse_ar: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌۭ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ

verse_en: O man, what seduced you from your munificent Lord
verse_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلْكَرِيمِ

verse_en: Who created you then formed your symmetry, then gave you right proportion,
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّىٰكَ فَعَدَلَكَ

verse_en: Shaping you into any form He pleased?
verse_ar: فِىٓ أَىِّ صُورَةٍۢ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ

verse_en: Even then you deny the Judgement.
verse_ar: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِٱلدِّينِ

verse_en: Surely there are guardians over you,
verse_ar: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَٰفِظِينَ

verse_en: Illustrious scribes
verse_ar: كِرَامًۭا كَٰتِبِينَ

verse_en: Who know what you do.
verse_ar: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ

verse_en: The pious will surely be in heaven,
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍۢ

verse_en: The wicked certainly in Hell:
verse_ar: وَإِنَّ ٱلْفُجَّارَ لَفِى جَحِيمٍۢ

verse_en: They will burn in it on the Day of Judgement,
verse_ar: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ ٱلدِّينِ

verse_en: And will not be removed from it.
verse_ar: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَآئِبِينَ

verse_en: How can you comprehend what the Day of Judgement is?
verse_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ

verse_en: How then can you comprehend what the Day of Judgement is?
verse_ar: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ

verse_en: It is the day when no soul will have power to do the least for a soul, and God's alone will be done.
verse_ar: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌۭ لِّنَفْسٍۢ شَيْـًۭٔا ۖ وَٱلْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلَّهِ

verse_en: WOE TO THOSE who give short measure,
verse_ar: وَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ

verse_en: Who insist on being given full when they take from others,
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكْتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ

verse_en: Whilst when they measure or weigh for them, give less.
verse_ar: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ

verse_en: Do they not think they will be raised (to life) again
verse_ar: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ

verse_en: On a grievous day,
verse_ar: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ

verse_en: The day all mankind will stand before the Lord of all the worlds?
verse_ar: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ

verse_en: Indeed the ledger of the wicked will be in (the lowest depths) Sijjin.
verse_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلْفُجَّارِ لَفِى سِجِّينٍۢ

verse_en: How will you comprehend what Sijjin is?
verse_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينٌۭ

verse_en: It is a (repository of) distinctly written record.
verse_ar: كِتَٰبٌۭ مَّرْقُومٌۭ

verse_en: Ah the woe that day for those who deny,
verse_ar: وَيْلٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ

verse_en: Who call the Day of judgement a lie!
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ

verse_en: None denies it but the sinful transgressors.
verse_ar: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

verse_en: When Our revelations are recited before him, he says: "These are fables of long ago."
verse_ar: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

verse_en: No. In fact what they have been doing has rusted their hearts.
verse_ar: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ

verse_en: Therefore they will be screened off from their Lord that day,
verse_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ

verse_en: Then they will indeed burn in Hell.
verse_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُوا۟ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

verse_en: They will then be told: "This is what you had denied."
verse_ar: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

verse_en: Surely the ledger of the pious will be in 'Illiyun (heights above the heights).
verse_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلْأَبْرَارِ لَفِى عِلِّيِّينَ

verse_en: But how will you comprehend what 'Illiyun is?
verse_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ

verse_en: It is a (repository of) distinctly written record
verse_ar: كِتَٰبٌۭ مَّرْقُومٌۭ

verse_en: Witnessed by those who are honoured.
verse_ar: يَشْهَدُهُ ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ

verse_en: Verily the pious will be in heaven,
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ لَفِى نَعِيمٍ

verse_en: On couches face to face.
verse_ar: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ

verse_en: On their faces you will see the glow of beatitude.
verse_ar: تَعْرِفُ فِى وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
