verse_en: They will be served the choicest wine, sealed
verse_ar: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍۢ مَّخْتُومٍ

verse_en: With a sealing of musk, which those who aspire for the best should desire, --
verse_ar: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسْكٌۭ ۚ وَفِى ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلْمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ

verse_en: Blended with the water of Tasnim, (heights ultimate of evolution),
verse_ar: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ

verse_en: A fountain from which only they who are honoured drink.
verse_ar: عَيْنًۭا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُقَرَّبُونَ

verse_en: The sinners indeed laughed at believers
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ يَضْحَكُونَ

verse_en: And winked at one another as they passed by them;
verse_ar: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ

verse_en: And when they went back to their people turned to make fun of them;
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِينَ

verse_en: And when they saw them, they said: "They have indeed gone astray."
verse_ar: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

verse_en: But they were not Sent to be guardians over them!
verse_ar: وَمَآ أُرْسِلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِمْ حَٰفِظِينَ

verse_en: So, the believers will laugh at the infidels on that day,
verse_ar: فَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ

verse_en: Regarding them from their cushioned seats.
verse_ar: عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ

verse_en: Will not the infidels pay for what they had done?
verse_ar: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ ٱلْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ

verse_en: WHEN THE SKY is cleft asunder,
verse_ar: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتْ

verse_en: And hearkens to its Lord and is dutiful,
verse_ar: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ

verse_en: When the earth is stretched out taut
verse_ar: وَإِذَا ٱلْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ

verse_en: And throws out whatever it contains and is empty,
verse_ar: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ

verse_en: And hearkens to its Lord and is dutiful,
verse_ar: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ

verse_en: O man, you have to strive and go on striving towards your Lord, then will you meet Him.
verse_ar: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًۭا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ

verse_en: And he who is given his ledger in his right hand
verse_ar: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ

verse_en: Will have an easy reckoning,
verse_ar: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًۭا يَسِيرًۭا

verse_en: And will return to his people full of joy.
verse_ar: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًۭا

verse_en: But he who is given his ledger from behind his back
verse_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِىَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهْرِهِۦ

verse_en: Will pray for death,
verse_ar: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُوا۟ ثُبُورًۭا

verse_en: But will be roasted in the fire.
verse_ar: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا

verse_en: He lived rejoicing among his people,
verse_ar: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِىٓ أَهْلِهِۦ مَسْرُورًا

verse_en: Never thinking he will return.
verse_ar: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ

verse_en: Why not? His Lord was always watching him.
verse_ar: بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرًۭا

verse_en: So indeed I call to witness the evening twilight,
verse_ar: فَلَآ أُقْسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ

verse_en: And the night and all it gathers,
verse_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ

verse_en: And the moon when at the full,
verse_ar: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ

verse_en: That you will climb from stage to stage.
verse_ar: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍۢ

verse_en: So, wherefore do they not believe?
verse_ar: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

verse_en: And when the Qur'an is recited to them do not bow in adoration?
verse_ar: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقُرْءَانُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩

verse_en: In fact the unbelievers disavow.
verse_ar: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يُكَذِّبُونَ

verse_en: But God knows what they harbour in their breasts.
verse_ar: وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ

verse_en: So give them news of painful punishment,
verse_ar: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ

verse_en: Except those who believe and do the right: For them there is reward unending.
verse_ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۭ

verse_en: I CALL TO witness the sky (bespangled) with the signs of the Zodiac,
verse_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْبُرُوجِ

verse_en: And the promised day,
verse_ar: وَٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْمَوْعُودِ

verse_en: And the witness and the witnessed,
verse_ar: وَشَاهِدٍۢ وَمَشْهُودٍۢ

verse_en: That accursed are the men of the trench
verse_ar: قُتِلَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْأُخْدُودِ

verse_en: Full of fire fed by faggots,
verse_ar: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلْوَقُودِ

verse_en: As they sat around it
verse_ar: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌۭ

verse_en: Witnessing what they had done to the believers!
verse_ar: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌۭ

verse_en: They had no other reason for hating them except that they believed in God the mighty, worthy of praise,
verse_ar: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ

verse_en: Whose kingdom spreads over the heavens and the earth. God is witness over everything.
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ شَهِيدٌ

verse_en: Surely for those who persecute believers, men and women, and do not repent afterwards, is the punishment of Hell, and the punishment of burning.
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ

verse_en: Surely for those who believe and do the right are gardens with rivers running by. That is the greatest success.
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّٰتٌۭ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ

verse_en: The grip of your Lord is severe indeed!
verse_ar: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ

verse_en: It is verily He who initiates and repeats.
verse_ar: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ

verse_en: He is the forgiving and the loving,
verse_ar: وَهُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلْوَدُودُ

verse_en: The Lord of the glorious Throne,
verse_ar: ذُو ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْمَجِيدُ

verse_en: Who does as He pleases.
verse_ar: فَعَّالٌۭ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ

verse_en: Has the story of the hordes
verse_ar: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْجُنُودِ

verse_en: Of Pharaoh and Thamud come to you?
verse_ar: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ

verse_en: Yet the infidels persist in denial.
verse_ar: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى تَكْذِيبٍۢ

verse_en: But God surrounds them from all sides.
verse_ar: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطٌۢ

verse_en: This is indeed the glorious Qur'an
verse_ar: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْءَانٌۭ مَّجِيدٌۭ

verse_en: (Preserved) on the guarded tablet.
verse_ar: فِى لَوْحٍۢ مَّحْفُوظٍۭ

verse_en: I CALL TO witness the heavens and the night Star --
verse_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ

verse_en: How will you comprehend what the night star is?
verse_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ

verse_en: It is the star that shines with a piercing brightness --
verse_ar: ٱلنَّجْمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ

verse_en: That over each soul there is a guardian.
verse_ar: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌۭ

verse_en: Let man consider what he was made of:
verse_ar: فَلْيَنظُرِ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ

verse_en: He was created of spurting water
verse_ar: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٍۢ دَافِقٍۢ

verse_en: Issuing from (the pelvis) between the backbone and the ribs.
verse_ar: يَخْرُجُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ ٱلصُّلْبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ

verse_en: God has certainly power to bring him back (from the dead).
verse_ar: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٌۭ

verse_en: The day all secrets are examined
verse_ar: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ

verse_en: He will have no strength or helper.
verse_ar: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٍۢ وَلَا نَاصِرٍۢ

verse_en: So I call to witness the rain-producing sky,
verse_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجْعِ

verse_en: And the earth which opens up (with verdure),
verse_ar: وَٱلْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدْعِ

verse_en: That this (Qur'an) is a decisive word
verse_ar: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوْلٌۭ فَصْلٌۭ

verse_en: And no trifle.
verse_ar: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلْهَزْلِ

verse_en: They are hatching up a plot,
verse_ar: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًۭا

verse_en: But I too am devising a plan.
verse_ar: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًۭا

verse_en: So bear with unbelievers with patience, and give them respite for a while.
verse_ar: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًۢا

verse_en: GLORIFY THE NAME of your Lord, most high,
verse_ar: سَبِّحِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلْأَعْلَى

verse_en: Who creates and proportions,
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ

verse_en: Who determines and directs,
verse_ar: وَٱلَّذِى قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ

verse_en: Who brings out the pastures
verse_ar: وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَخْرَجَ ٱلْمَرْعَىٰ

verse_en: Then reduces them to rusty rubbish.
verse_ar: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحْوَىٰ

verse_en: We shall make you recite (the Qur'an) so that you will not forget it,
verse_ar: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ

verse_en: Unless God may please. He knows the visible and knows what is hidden.
verse_ar: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ

verse_en: We shall take you slowly towards ease.
verse_ar: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ

verse_en: So remind them if reminder is profitable:
verse_ar: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ

verse_en: Those who fear will understand.
verse_ar: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ

verse_en: Only the wretch will turn aside,
verse_ar: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَشْقَى

verse_en: Who will burn in the terrible Fire,
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِى يَصْلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰ

verse_en: In which he will neither die nor live.
verse_ar: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ

verse_en: Surely he will succeed who grows in goodness,
verse_ar: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ

verse_en: And recites the name of his Lord and serves with devotion.
verse_ar: وَذَكَرَ ٱسْمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ

verse_en: But no, you prefer the life of the world,
verse_ar: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا

verse_en: Though the life to come is better and abiding.
verse_ar: وَٱلْءَاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌۭ وَأَبْقَىٰٓ

verse_en: This is surely in the earlier Books,
verse_ar: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِى ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلْأُولَىٰ

verse_en: The Books of Abraham and Moses.
verse_ar: صُحُفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ

verse_en: HAS NEWS OF the Overpowering Event reached you?
verse_ar: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلْغَٰشِيَةِ

verse_en: Many faces will be contrite on that day,
verse_ar: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَٰشِعَةٌ

verse_en: Labouring, wearied out,
verse_ar: عَامِلَةٌۭ نَّاصِبَةٌۭ

verse_en: Burning in the scorching fire,
verse_ar: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةًۭ

verse_en: Given water from the boiling spring to drink.
verse_ar: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ ءَانِيَةٍۢ

verse_en: They will have no food except bitter thorn,
verse_ar: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍۢ

verse_en: Neither nourishing nor banishing hunger.
verse_ar: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِن جُوعٍۢ

verse_en: Many faces will be joyous on that day,
verse_ar: وُجُوهٌۭ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ نَّاعِمَةٌۭ

verse_en: Well-pleased with their endeavour,
verse_ar: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌۭ

verse_en: In the high empyrean,
verse_ar: فِى جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍۢ

verse_en: Never hearing idle talk.
verse_ar: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَٰغِيَةًۭ

verse_en: There is a stream of running water in it;
verse_ar: فِيهَا عَيْنٌۭ جَارِيَةٌۭ

verse_en: And within it are couches placed on high,
verse_ar: فِيهَا سُرُرٌۭ مَّرْفُوعَةٌۭ

verse_en: Goblets set,
verse_ar: وَأَكْوَابٌۭ مَّوْضُوعَةٌۭ

verse_en: Cushions arranged,
verse_ar: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌۭ

verse_en: And rich carpets spread.
verse_ar: وَزَرَابِىُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ

verse_en: Do they not then ponder how the clouds were formed;
verse_ar: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ

verse_en: And the heavens, how it was raised high;
verse_ar: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ

verse_en: And the mountains, how they were fixed;
verse_ar: وَإِلَى ٱلْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ

verse_en: And the earth, how it was spread out?
verse_ar: وَإِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ

verse_en: Remind them; you are surely a reminder.
verse_ar: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌۭ

verse_en: You are not a warden over them,
verse_ar: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ

verse_en: Other than him who turns his back and denies,
verse_ar: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ

verse_en: In which case he will be punished by God with the severest punishment.
verse_ar: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَكْبَرَ

verse_en: To Us is surely their returning;
verse_ar: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَآ إِيَابَهُمْ

verse_en: Ours is surely then to reckon with them.
verse_ar: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم

verse_en: I CALL TO witness the dawn
verse_ar: وَٱلْفَجْرِ

verse_en: And the Ten Nights,
verse_ar: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍۢ

verse_en: The multiple and the one,
verse_ar: وَٱلشَّفْعِ وَٱلْوَتْرِ

verse_en: The night as it advances,
verse_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ

verse_en: Is there not an evidence in this for those who have sense?
verse_ar: هَلْ فِى ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌۭ لِّذِى حِجْرٍ

verse_en: Have you not seen what your Lord did to the 'Ad
verse_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ

verse_en: Of Eram with lofty pillars (erected as signposts in the desert),
verse_ar: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلْعِمَادِ

verse_en: The like of whom were never created in the realm;
verse_ar: ٱلَّتِى لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ

verse_en: And with Thamud who carved rocks in the valley;
verse_ar: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُوا۟ ٱلصَّخْرَ بِٱلْوَادِ

verse_en: And the mighty Pharaoh
verse_ar: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِى ٱلْأَوْتَادِ

verse_en: Who terrorised the region,
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ

verse_en: And multiplied corruption.
verse_ar: فَأَكْثَرُوا۟ فِيهَا ٱلْفَسَادَ

verse_en: So your Lord poured a scourge of punishment over them.
verse_ar: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ

verse_en: Your Lord is certainly in wait.
verse_ar: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلْمِرْصَادِ

verse_en: As for man, whenever his Lord tries him and then is gracious and provides good things for him, he says: "My Lord has been gracious to me."
verse_ar: فَأَمَّا ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكْرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَكْرَمَنِ

verse_en: But when He tries him by restraining his means, he says: "My Lord despises me."
verse_ar: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبْتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّىٓ أَهَٰنَنِ

verse_en: No. In fact you are not generous to the orphans,
verse_ar: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ ٱلْيَتِيمَ

verse_en: Nor do you urge one another to feed the poor,
verse_ar: وَلَا تَحَٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ

verse_en: And you devour (others') inheritance greedily,
verse_ar: وَتَأْكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكْلًۭا لَّمًّۭا

verse_en: And love wealth with all your heart.
verse_ar: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلْمَالَ حُبًّۭا جَمًّۭا

verse_en: Surely when We pound the earth to powder grounded, pounded to dust,
verse_ar: كَلَّآ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ دَكًّۭا دَكًّۭا

verse_en: And comes your Lord, and angels row on row,
verse_ar: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلْمَلَكُ صَفًّۭا صَفًّۭا

verse_en: And Hell is brought near, that day will man remember, but of what avail will then remembering be?
verse_ar: وَجِا۟ىٓءَ يَوْمَئِذٍۭ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ

verse_en: He will say: "Alas the woe! Would that I had sent ahead something in my life."
verse_ar: يَقُولُ يَٰلَيْتَنِى قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِى

verse_en: None can punish as He will punish on that day,
verse_ar: فَيَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌۭ

verse_en: And none can bind as He will bind.
verse_ar: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌۭ

verse_en: O you tranquil soul,
verse_ar: يَٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفْسُ ٱلْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ

verse_en: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and well-pleasing Him.
verse_ar: ٱرْجِعِىٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةًۭ مَّرْضِيَّةًۭ

verse_en: "Enter then among My votaries,
verse_ar: فَٱدْخُلِى فِى عِبَٰدِى

verse_en: Enter then My garden."
verse_ar: وَٱدْخُلِى جَنَّتِى

verse_en: I CALL THIS earth to witness --
verse_ar: لَآ أُقْسِمُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ

verse_en: And you are free to live upon it, --
verse_ar: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّۢ بِهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ

verse_en: And the parent and the offspring,
verse_ar: وَوَالِدٍۢ وَمَا وَلَدَ

verse_en: That We created man in toil and trouble.
verse_ar: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ فِى كَبَدٍ

verse_en: Does he think that no one has power over him?
verse_ar: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌۭ

verse_en: He says: "I have wasted a great deal of wealth."
verse_ar: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًۭا لُّبَدًا

verse_en: Does he think that no one sees him?
verse_ar: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ

verse_en: Did We not give him two eyes,
verse_ar: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ عَيْنَيْنِ

verse_en: One tongue, and two lips,
verse_ar: وَلِسَانًۭا وَشَفَتَيْنِ

verse_en: And showed him two highways (of good and evil)?
verse_ar: وَهَدَيْنَٰهُ ٱلنَّجْدَيْنِ

verse_en: But he could not scale the steep ascent.
verse_ar: فَلَا ٱقْتَحَمَ ٱلْعَقَبَةَ

verse_en: How will you comprehend what the Steep ascent is? --
verse_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْعَقَبَةُ

verse_en: To free a neck (from the burden of debt or slavery),
verse_ar: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ

verse_en: Or to feed in times of famine
verse_ar: أَوْ إِطْعَٰمٌۭ فِى يَوْمٍۢ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍۢ

verse_en: The orphan near in relationship,
verse_ar: يَتِيمًۭا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ

verse_en: Or the poor in distress;
verse_ar: أَوْ مِسْكِينًۭا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍۢ

verse_en: And to be of those who believe, and urge upon one another to persevere, and urge upon each other to be kind.
verse_ar: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ

verse_en: They are the people of the right hand (and will succeed).
verse_ar: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَيْمَنَةِ

verse_en: But those who deny Our revelations are the people of the left hand:
verse_ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ

verse_en: The Fire will vault them over.
verse_ar: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌۭ مُّؤْصَدَةٌۢ

verse_en: I CALL TO witness the sun and his early morning splendour,
verse_ar: وَٱلشَّمْسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا

verse_en: And the moon as she follows in his wake,
verse_ar: وَٱلْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا

verse_en: The day when it reveals his radiance,
verse_ar: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا

verse_en: The night when it covers him over,
verse_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰهَا

verse_en: The heavens and its architecture,
verse_ar: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا

verse_en: The earth and its spreading out,
verse_ar: وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا

verse_en: The soul and how it was integrated
verse_ar: وَنَفْسٍۢ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا

verse_en: And given the faculty of knowing what is disruptive and what is intrinsic to it.
verse_ar: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَىٰهَا

verse_en: He who nourishes it will surely be successful,
verse_ar: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا

verse_en: And he who confines it will surely come to grief.
verse_ar: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا

verse_en: The Thamud denied (the truth) in their perverseness
verse_ar: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَىٰهَآ

verse_en: When among them the great wretch arose,
verse_ar: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشْقَىٰهَا

verse_en: And the apostle of God had to tell them: "This is God's she-camel, let her drink."
verse_ar: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقْيَٰهَا

verse_en: But they called him a liar and hamstrung her. So God obliterated them for their crime, and (destroyed) all of them alike.
verse_ar: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسَوَّىٰهَا

verse_en: He does not fear the consequence.
verse_ar: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَٰهَا

verse_en: I CALL THE night to witness when it covers over,
verse_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ

verse_en: And the day when it shines in all its glory,
verse_ar: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ

verse_en: And Him who created the male and female,
verse_ar: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلْأُنثَىٰٓ

verse_en: That your endeavour is for different ends.
verse_ar: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ

verse_en: Yet he who gives to others and has fear,
verse_ar: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ

verse_en: And affirms goodness,
verse_ar: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ

verse_en: We shall ease the way of fortune for him.
verse_ar: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ

verse_en: But he who does not give and is unconcerned,
verse_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسْتَغْنَىٰ

verse_en: And rejects goodness,
verse_ar: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلْحُسْنَىٰ

verse_en: For him We shall ease the way of adversity,
verse_ar: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ

verse_en: And his riches will not avail him when he falls headlong (into the Abyss).
verse_ar: وَمَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ

verse_en: It is indeed for Us to show the way,
verse_ar: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ

verse_en: And to Us belong the End and the Beginning.
verse_ar: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْءَاخِرَةَ وَٱلْأُولَىٰ

verse_en: So, I warn you of the blazing Fire.
verse_ar: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًۭا تَلَظَّىٰ

verse_en: No one will burn in it but the most wretched,
verse_ar: لَا يَصْلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلْأَشْقَى

verse_en: Who denied (the truth) and turned away.
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِى كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

verse_en: But save him who fears
verse_ar: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلْأَتْقَى

verse_en: And gives of his wealth that he may grow in virtue,
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِى يُؤْتِى مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ

verse_en: And is under no one's obligation to return his favour,
verse_ar: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعْمَةٍۢ تُجْزَىٰٓ

verse_en: Other than seeking the glory of his Lord, most high,
verse_ar: إِلَّا ٱبْتِغَآءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ

verse_en: Will surely be gratified.
verse_ar: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ

verse_en: I CALL TO witness the early hours of morning,
verse_ar: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ

verse_en: And the night when dark and still,
verse_ar: وَٱلَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ

verse_en: Your Lord has neither left you, nor despises you.
verse_ar: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ

verse_en: What is to come is better for you than what has gone before;
verse_ar: وَلَلْءَاخِرَةُ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ

verse_en: For your Lord will certainly give you, and you will be content.
verse_ar: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰٓ

verse_en: Did He not find you an orphan and take care of you?
verse_ar: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًۭا فَـَٔاوَىٰ

verse_en: Did He not find you perplexed, and show you the way?
verse_ar: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلًّۭا فَهَدَىٰ

verse_en: Did He not find you poor and enrich you?
verse_ar: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلًۭا فَأَغْنَىٰ

verse_en: So do not oppress the orphan,
verse_ar: فَأَمَّا ٱلْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ

verse_en: And do not drive the beggar away,
verse_ar: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ

verse_en: And keep recounting the favours of your Lord.
verse_ar: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ

verse_en: HAVE WE NOT opened up your breast
verse_ar: أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ

verse_en: And removed your burden
verse_ar: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ

verse_en: Which had left you devoid of hope,
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ

verse_en: And exalted your fame?
verse_ar: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ

verse_en: Surely with hardship there is ease.
verse_ar: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا

verse_en: With hardship indeed there is ease.
verse_ar: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلْعُسْرِ يُسْرًۭا

verse_en: So when you are free work diligently,
verse_ar: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَٱنصَبْ

verse_en: And turn to your Lord with all your love.
verse_ar: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرْغَب

verse_en: I CALL TO witness the Fig and the Olive,
verse_ar: وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيْتُونِ

verse_en: The Mount Sinai,
verse_ar: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ

verse_en: And this Soil Secure,
verse_ar: وَهَٰذَا ٱلْبَلَدِ ٱلْأَمِينِ

verse_en: That We created man of finest possibilities,
verse_ar: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍۢ

verse_en: Then brought him down to the lowest of the low,
verse_ar: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَٰهُ أَسْفَلَ سَٰفِلِينَ

verse_en: Except those who believe and do the right, for whom there is reward undiminished.
verse_ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍۢ

verse_en: Who should then make you deny the Judgement after this?
verse_ar: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِٱلدِّينِ

verse_en: Is not God the most equitable of all judges?
verse_ar: أَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ ٱلْحَٰكِمِينَ

verse_en: READ IN THE name of your Lord who created,
verse_ar: ٱقْرَأْ بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ

verse_en: Created man from an embryo;
verse_ar: خَلَقَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ

verse_en: Read, for your Lord is most beneficent,
verse_ar: ٱقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلْأَكْرَمُ

verse_en: Who taught by the pen,
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِى عَلَّمَ بِٱلْقَلَمِ

verse_en: Taught man what he did not know.
verse_ar: عَلَّمَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ

verse_en: And yet, but yet man is rebellious,
verse_ar: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لَيَطْغَىٰٓ

verse_en: For he thinks he is sufficient in himself.
verse_ar: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسْتَغْنَىٰٓ

verse_en: Surely your returning is to your Lord.
verse_ar: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجْعَىٰٓ

verse_en: Have you seen him who restrains
verse_ar: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يَنْهَىٰ

verse_en: A votary when he turns to his devotions?
verse_ar: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ

verse_en: Have you thought, if he had been on guidance
verse_ar: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ

verse_en: Or had enjoined piety, (it would have been better)?
verse_ar: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقْوَىٰٓ

verse_en: Have you thought that if he denies and turns away,
verse_ar: أَرَءَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ

verse_en: Does he not know that God sees?
verse_ar: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرَىٰ

verse_en: And yet indeed if he does not desist We shall drag him by the forelock,
verse_ar: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ

verse_en: By the lying, the sinful forelock.
verse_ar: نَاصِيَةٍۢ كَٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍۢ

verse_en: So let him call his associates,
verse_ar: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُۥ

verse_en: We shall call the guards of Hell.
verse_ar: سَنَدْعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ

verse_en: Beware! Do not obey him, but bow in adoration and draw near (to your Lord).
verse_ar: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَٱسْجُدْ وَٱقْتَرِب ۩

verse_en: TRULY WE REVEALED it on the Night of Determination.
verse_ar: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةِ ٱلْقَدْرِ

verse_en: How will you know what the Night of Determination is?
verse_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ

verse_en: Better is the Night of Determination than a thousand months.
verse_ar: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌۭ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍۢ

verse_en: On (this night) the angels and grace descend by the dispensation of their Lord, for settling all affairs.
verse_ar: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍۢ

verse_en: It is peace till the dawning of the day.
verse_ar: سَلَٰمٌ هِىَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ ٱلْفَجْرِ

verse_en: THOSE AMONG THE people of the Book who disbelieve, and the idolaters, would not have been freed (from false beliefs) until the clear proof came to them --
verse_ar: لَمْ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ

verse_en: An Apostle from God, reading out hallowed pages
verse_ar: رَسُولٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتْلُوا۟ صُحُفًۭا مُّطَهَّرَةًۭ

verse_en: Containing firm decrees.
verse_ar: فِيهَا كُتُبٌۭ قَيِّمَةٌۭ

verse_en: The people of the Book were not divided among themselves till after the clear proof had come to them.
verse_ar: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَتْهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَةُ

verse_en: They were commanded only to serve God with all-exclusive faith in Him, to be upright, and to fulfil their devotional obligations, and to give zakat; for this is the even way.
verse_ar: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤْتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلْقَيِّمَةِ

verse_en: Surely the unbelievers among the people of the Book and the idolaters, will abide in the fire of Hell. They are the worst of creatures.
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَٰبِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ فِى نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ ۚ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ

verse_en: But those who believe and do the right are surely the best of created beings,
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ ٱلْبَرِيَّةِ

verse_en: Whose reward is with their Lord -- gardens of Eden with rivers flowing by, where they will abide for ever, God pleased with their service, they with obedience to Him. This (awaits) him who stands in awe of his Lord.
verse_ar: جَزَآؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّٰتُ عَدْنٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًۭا ۖ رَّضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا۟ عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِىَ رَبَّهُۥ

verse_en: WHEN THE WORLD is shaken up by its cataclysm,
verse_ar: إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا

verse_en: And the earth throws out its burdens,
verse_ar: وَأَخْرَجَتِ ٱلْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا

verse_en: And man enquires: "What has come over it?"
verse_ar: وَقَالَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مَا لَهَا

verse_en: That day it will narrate its annals,
verse_ar: يَوْمَئِذٍۢ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا

verse_en: For your Lord will have commanded it.
verse_ar: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا

verse_en: That day people will proceed separately to be shown their deeds.
verse_ar: يَوْمَئِذٍۢ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًۭا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَٰلَهُمْ

verse_en: Whosoever has done even an atom's weight of good will behold it;
verse_ar: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًۭا يَرَهُۥ

verse_en: And whosoever has done even an atom's weight of evil will behold that.
verse_ar: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍۢ شَرًّۭا يَرَهُۥ

verse_en: I CALL TO witness the chargers, snorting, rushing to battle before the others,
verse_ar: وَٱلْعَٰدِيَٰتِ ضَبْحًۭا

verse_en: Then those striking sparks of fire,
verse_ar: فَٱلْمُورِيَٰتِ قَدْحًۭا

verse_en: Then those charging in the morning
verse_ar: فَٱلْمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبْحًۭا

verse_en: Raising clouds of dust,
verse_ar: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِۦ نَقْعًۭا

verse_en: Penetrating deep into the armies,
verse_ar: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِۦ جَمْعًا

verse_en: That man is ungrateful to his Lord
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٌۭ

verse_en: And is himself witness to it,
verse_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌۭ

verse_en: And is intractable in his love of worldly goods.
verse_ar: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ

verse_en: Does he not know when the contents of the graves are laid bare
verse_ar: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ

verse_en: And the secrets of the hearts exposed,
verse_ar: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ

verse_en: Surely their Lord will be aware of their (deeds).
verse_ar: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ لَّخَبِيرٌۢ

verse_en: THE STARTLING CALAMITY.
verse_ar: ٱلْقَارِعَةُ

verse_en: What is the startling calamity?
verse_ar: مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ

verse_en: How will you comprehend what the startling calamity is? --
verse_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْقَارِعَةُ

verse_en: A Day on which human beings would be like so many scattered moths,
verse_ar: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلْفَرَاشِ ٱلْمَبْثُوثِ

verse_en: The mountains like the tufts of carded wool.
verse_ar: وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ ٱلْمَنفُوشِ

verse_en: Then he whose deeds shall weigh heavier in the scale
verse_ar: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ

verse_en: Will have a tranquil life;
verse_ar: فَهُوَ فِى عِيشَةٍۢ رَّاضِيَةٍۢ

verse_en: But he whose deeds are lighter in the balance
verse_ar: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ

verse_en: Will have the Abyss for abode.
verse_ar: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٌۭ

verse_en: How will you comprehend what that is?
verse_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا هِيَهْ

verse_en: It is the scorching fire.
verse_ar: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌۢ

verse_en: THE AVARICE OF plenitude keeps you occupied
verse_ar: أَلْهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ

verse_en: Till you reach the grave.
verse_ar: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ ٱلْمَقَابِرَ

verse_en: But you will come to know soon; --
verse_ar: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ

verse_en: Indeed you will come to know soon.
verse_ar: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ

verse_en: And yet if you knew with positive knowledge
verse_ar: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ ٱلْيَقِينِ

verse_en: You have indeed to behold Hell;
verse_ar: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلْجَحِيمَ

verse_en: Then you will see it with the eye of certainty.
verse_ar: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ ٱلْيَقِينِ

verse_en: Then on that day you will surely be asked about the verity of pleasures.
verse_ar: ثُمَّ لَتُسْـَٔلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

verse_en: TIME AND AGE are witness
verse_ar: وَٱلْعَصْرِ

verse_en: Man is certainly loss,
verse_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَٰنَ لَفِى خُسْرٍ

verse_en: Except those who believe, and do good and enjoin truth on one another, and enjoin one another to bear with fortitude (the trials that befall).
verse_ar: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ

verse_en: WOE TO EVERY slanderer, back-biter,
verse_ar: وَيْلٌۭ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍۢ لُّمَزَةٍ

verse_en: Who amasses wealth and hordes it.
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِى جَمَعَ مَالًۭا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ

verse_en: Does he think his wealth will abide for ever with him?
verse_ar: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخْلَدَهُۥ

verse_en: By no means. He will be thrown into Hutama.
verse_ar: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِى ٱلْحُطَمَةِ

verse_en: How will you comprehend what Hutama is?
verse_ar: وَمَآ أَدْرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلْحُطَمَةُ

verse_en: It is the fire kindled by God
verse_ar: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمُوقَدَةُ

verse_en: Which penetrates the hearts
verse_ar: ٱلَّتِى تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةِ

verse_en: (And) vaults them over
verse_ar: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌۭ

verse_en: In extending columns.
verse_ar: فِى عَمَدٍۢ مُّمَدَّدَةٍۭ

verse_en: HAVE YOU NOT seen how your Lord dealt with the people of the elephants?
verse_ar: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَٰبِ ٱلْفِيلِ

verse_en: Did He not make their plan go wrong,
verse_ar: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِى تَضْلِيلٍۢ

verse_en: And sent hordes of chargers flying against them,
verse_ar: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ

verse_en: (While) you were pelting them with stones of porphyritic lava,
verse_ar: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍۢ مِّن سِجِّيلٍۢ

verse_en: And turned them into pastured fields of corn?
verse_ar: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍۢ مَّأْكُولٍۭ

verse_en: SINCE THE QURAISH have been united,
verse_ar: لِإِيلَٰفِ قُرَيْشٍ

verse_en: United to fit out caravans winter and summer,
verse_ar: إِۦلَٰفِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيْفِ

verse_en: Let them worship the Lord of this House,
verse_ar: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّ هَٰذَا ٱلْبَيْتِ

verse_en: Who provided them against destitution and gave them security against fear.
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍۢ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ

verse_en: HAVE YOU SEEN him who denies the Day of Judgement?
verse_ar: أَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ

verse_en: It is he who pushes the orphan away,
verse_ar: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِى يَدُعُّ ٱلْيَتِيمَ

verse_en: And does not induce others to feed the needy.
verse_ar: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلْمِسْكِينِ

verse_en: Woe to those who pray
verse_ar: فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ

verse_en: But who are oblivious of their moral duties,
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ

verse_en: Who dissimulate
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَآءُونَ

verse_en: And withhold things of common use (from others).
verse_ar: وَيَمْنَعُونَ ٱلْمَاعُونَ

verse_en: HAVE SURELY given you pre-eminence (in numbers and following);
verse_ar: إِنَّآ أَعْطَيْنَٰكَ ٱلْكَوْثَرَ

verse_en: So serve your Lord with full dedication and sacrifice.
verse_ar: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنْحَرْ

verse_en: It is surely your opponents whose line will come to end.
verse_ar: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلْأَبْتَرُ

verse_en: SAY: "O YOU unbelievers,
verse_ar: قُلْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلْكَٰفِرُونَ

verse_en: I do not worship what you worship,
verse_ar: لَآ أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ

verse_en: Nor do you worship who I worship,
verse_ar: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ

verse_en: Nor will I worship what you worship,
verse_ar: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدٌۭ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ

verse_en: Nor will you worship who I worship:
verse_ar: وَلَآ أَنتُمْ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعْبُدُ

verse_en: To you your way, to me my way
verse_ar: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِىَ دِينِ

verse_en: WHEN THE HELP of God arrives and victory,
verse_ar: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصْرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْفَتْحُ

verse_en: And you see men enter God's discipline horde on horde,
verse_ar: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًۭا

verse_en: Then glorify your Lord and seek His forgiveness. Verily He is relenting.
verse_ar: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا

verse_en: DESTROYED WILL BE the hands of Abu Lahab, and he himself will perish.
verse_ar: تَبَّتْ يَدَآ أَبِى لَهَبٍۢ وَتَبَّ

verse_en: Of no avail shall be his wealth, nor what he has acquired.
verse_ar: مَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ

verse_en: He will be roasted in the fire,
verse_ar: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًۭا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍۢ

verse_en: And his wife, the portress of fire wood,
verse_ar: وَٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلْحَطَبِ

verse_en: Will have a strap of fibre rope around her neck.
verse_ar: فِى جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌۭ مِّن مَّسَدٍۭ

verse_en: SAY: "HE IS God the one the most unique,
verse_ar: قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ

verse_en: God the immanently indispensable.
verse_ar: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ

verse_en: He has begotten no one, and is begotten of none.
verse_ar: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ

verse_en: There is no one comparable to Him."
verse_ar: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌۢ

verse_en: SAY: "I SEEK refuge with the Lord of rising day
verse_ar: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ

verse_en: From the evil of what He has created,
verse_ar: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ

verse_en: And the evil of evening darkness when it overspreads,
verse_ar: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ

verse_en: From the evil of sorceresses who blow incantations on knots,
verse_ar: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِى ٱلْعُقَدِ

verse_en: From the evil of the envier when he envies.
verse_ar: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ

verse_en: SAY: "I SEEK refuge with the Lord of men,
verse_ar: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ

verse_en: The King of men,
verse_ar: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ

verse_en: The God of men,
verse_ar: إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ

verse_en: From the evil of him who breathes temptations into the minds of men,
verse_ar: مِن شَرِّ ٱلْوَسْوَاسِ ٱلْخَنَّاسِ

verse_en: Who suggests evil thoughts to the hearts of men --
verse_ar: ٱلَّذِى يُوَسْوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ

verse_en: From among the jinns and men.
verse_ar: مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ
